story:
From the Inside Out is a spiritual guide taking the reader beyond spiritual theory, showing precisely how to simply access “Consciousness."

Along with a nine-point daily life proposal, my readers also receive something else.  They get instant access to a simple, "meditative" consciousness audio exercise, that I practice myself.  If they choose, readers can begin experiencing life changing, mindful-consciousness beginning the very first day of reading my book.

This experience provides a psychic defense against the daily pressures of life going forward. We naturally discover common solutions to common problems like bad habits, anxiety, fear and stressed emotions. It is as if we become un-hypnotized, released from a trance we didn’t even know we were in.  We wake up . . .  from the inside out!

All it takes is a few minutes each day to practice it. It is amazingly effective. It is fast acting. It is simple.


Why I Am Doing This?

Nearly everyone has untapped, inner creativity waiting to be unleashed. By accessing simple consciousness,

  • There is an instant release of new resourcefulness.
  • Intuition immediately elevates.
  • Obsessive needs diminish and fall away, purging the need to indulge in harmful substances and behaviors.
  • The world and the people around us modify to accommodate our new state of being.
  • We maintain leverage in our personal relationships as never before.

  • We cannot help but spill creative, positive energy into the stream of life, influencing our present and future.

  • We become naturally virtuous in all our affairs.

What if more people would experience this kind of lifestyle? Then each individual having a personal awakening experience would extend that inner change outward, into the world around them. It would form a natural, global collective of blessings.

This is the kind of world I want my children to live in. It's the world I want to live in. I am pretty sure you do too.

The manuscript for this special book is written and will be published within weeks from the ending date of this campaign, in time for Christmas.

Who Am I?

My name is Dan Schwarzhoff. I am the author but also a “veteran” practitioner, with over thirty years living and teaching Mindfully Conscious Contact to others exactly as described in my books. For the last fifteen years I've been writing about this way of life.



Here are some sample bites of what people have had to say:

  • "Oh my God! The aha moments keep coming. I am amazed, absolutely stunned beyond belief!"- Brad M. - Michigan, USA
  • “In the two weeks since faithfully doing the meditation, I now sleep restfully. I was smoking a pack a day and without thinking about it I am at half a pack and most times don't even care to. I am fully aware of my surroundings and especially those about me. The smile returned to my face immediately. Self-pity has slipped away. My work and profession are more enjoyable and when I am alone I am peaceful. Financial insecurity and worry about that "stuff" does not rule me.”  - Bobby B. - Providence, RI
  • "Hey Danny. Things continue to improve as you say in ways I could never have imagined. This is the single most important practise in my life, without it, a return to self made misery... NO MORE. Grateful for your experience and your need to share this with the world." - Phil O. - Blackpool, England
  • “Awesome. I love your site. It has helped me so much through the years. Between you and my meetings and sponsorship I will be sober ten years in November even though I have been a member of AA for thirty years.” - Deborah N. - Harbor Hts., WA
  • "I just wanted to say that the meditation is working so well, and like you said, there has been a change in my daughter also – WOW! is all I can say. Resentment no longer plays a part in my life, I choose not to entertain anger and resentment and feel an inner calmness. I thank you." - Charlotte M. - Edinburg, Scotland
  • "I just finished your meditation. I know something has changed... been freed. I just don't have the words. Just a sense of it...serenity. I am grateful that God works through all of us. Thank you Danny." Ed K. - USA
  • "Hi Danny thanxs for the meditation it’s changed my life." - Steven K.  - Liverpool, England
  • “Awesome! Where have you been all along? I've tried other forms of meditations to no avail. I just finished my first 20 minutes of the Meditation Sampler. I have noticed the changes! I cannot thank you enough for your help! Peace and All Good!”  - Don W. - Louisville, KY
  • “I have had a lower back problem dating back to 29 years ago from which I have not had a single undisturbed night of sleep until making the meditation a part of my life. I now sleep well with no disturbance and I have even stopped my pain medication. This is a spiritual and psychic awakening. To say I am grateful is an understatement. What I owe you is beyond evaluation. Thanks.” - Mark F. - NSW, AU
  • “It has given back hope, which I had lost. I had feeling of empathy instead of all the festering hate. There is hope and thank you again for sending that.” - Deborah M. - Shaws Bend, TX
  • "Having been involved in Tibetan Buddhist meditation for years. I decided to try this meditation and cannot believe the shift that has occurred in my whole attitude, outlook and life in 2 weeks. My husband and many friends have also been practicing it and are finding it powerful. I am amazed. I thank you for making this available to us. It's truly a gift." - Helen G. - Cornwall, England
  • “I've been doing the meditation on my own now for the last 3 weeks and I've also started reading your book. Though I am going through a divorce, a hard time with my new girlfriend and a difficult time at work with anxiety, I am feeling better and better by the day. I truly feel like I have conscious contact with God. It certainly works - I feel the change and people around me are noticing the change."  - John L. - Salt Lake, UT
  • “I am absolutely amazed at how quick the meditation has worked on my ability to watch and not identify with ego. I have only been at it a couple of weeks and I feel only just scratched the surface. Thank you Danny.” - Pat C. - London, England
  • "Just wanted to drop a line to thank you for the meditation. My whole outlook has been taken to a whole new level since I started it, so thank you very much. I have turned others onto your link and they are seeing results as well." - Scott S. - Taylor, MI
  • "After I found your FB page, read your book, and did your meditation, I had a spiritual awakening. What I experienced is so hard to describe, but I feel through that experience and through my continued conscious contact with God, I am recovered." - Kelly T. - Hartford, Ct.

Each of these testimonials is 100% unsolicited.

"What Is Needed?"

Your contribution into this campaign is not going to be used to pay me a wage while I write a book. That leg of this endeavor is already done. The cost of printing and production of From The Inside Out will be taken care of by me, using my own resources, just as I did with my first book.

What your contribution will do is something I cannot do on my own. It will help fund  key marketing elements that are beyond production. These are tasks that must get done to establish significant outreach and to get this message out.

Your contribution will be prudently allocated toward (i) social media, (ii) technology, (iii) promotional activities, including a modest reading-signing tour and (iv) final editing to ensure that From The Inside Out is the finest quality possible.

I will see to it that the tiny mustard seed of your help amplifies an improvement of consciousness among people all over the world. This is a book you will find personal contentment from knowing you had a hand in getting out, believe me.

Please help me fan the sparks of this avocation into a wildfire of consciousness that has already begun to alter the courses of people's lives around the world.


"Why Should This Be Done?"

This is really, really important. We all live in stress packed environments. Over time the pressure exerts a cumulative effect on us. Each time we fail to react properly in the stream of life we sustain an alteration of psyche. This amounts to a shift in attitude and is behind every known emotionally based mental, physical distress.

In a final analysis, at least 90% of all strife, poverty, disease, war and every imaginable insanity and human misery can be linked to unconsciousness—people not mindfully connected with their spiritual self.

Before it gets better we may witness a frightening rise in violence, pandemic infections, and insanity. We will lose faith and trust in once magnanimous institutions and governments. Some of us will remain unharmed and will even grow spiritually through these disturbing trends—those of us who are conscious and who remain undisturbed. 

From The Inside Out is not a typical self-improvement proposition. With this book we are venturing into the realm of metaphysics—addressing powerful forces having an enormous impact on many people.

Mindfully aware people:

  • Live mentally and physically robust lives.

  • Are clear from the debilitating effects of negative emotions and are free from fear.

  • Develop a powerful immunity to stress and the deleterious effects of obsessive behavior and thinking.

  • Are not stepping on the toes of their fellows causing harms wherever they go.

  • Don’t make strings of poor life decisions.

  • Have solid, enriching relationships with others—whether romantic, family, business or social.

  • Are free from morbid habits like overeating, over-sexing, smoking, drinking and drugging.

  • Exhibit intuitive discipline from within, without emotional encumbrance, making our way peacefully and confidently on the path of life.


"What Will This Look Like?"

The website is going to be slammin’. Not only will it distribute books but also mp3’s and other free downloads. Readers will also be able to connect with each other and share their life changing experiences as the result of my book through a discussion board. They will have easy access to my blogs and any new videos I make. It’ll also capture emails for a newsletter signup and there will be a high-end shopping mall where I can always add new publications and recordings.

The Mobile App will allow readers to have easier access to the Consciousness Exercise and materials—on the fly, so to speak. Anytime during the day where there are dangers of dreaming or becoming mesmerized by life, a subscriber can easily practice waking up.

Promotion – A lion’s share (over 40%) of your contribution goes toward activities communicating the message of consciousness. This will include social media integration and public relations activities such as issuing press releases, making public appearances like book signings and engaging local, national and international (UK) broadcast interviews on television, radio and webcasts—as well as print media interviews in newspapers, magazines and online publications.

Editing – A final work-over will appraise the quality of “From the Inside Out” prior to being published through "CreateSpace". A professional will be contracted to provide a final assessment of the manuscript, adjusting for style standards to ensure its strength.

"When Will The Book Be Released?"

Anticipating late Fall and in time for Christmas 2014, “From the Inside Out” will be available on Amazon, Kindle, Barnes & Noble and Nook—as well as through an expanded distribution network of booksellers, schools and libraries throughout the U.S. and most of Europe.

Breaking It Down

What You Will Get

When you contribute, you’ll have the first copies of the book, or depending on the perks you select, both of my books—plus some other really great perks, like free access to the new streaming audio, audio downloads and more. Just have a peek on the right side of this page and you’ll see.

In For a Penny In For a Pound?

Perks are great, but of course this campaign isn’t only about perks. Your interest also gives you access to most powerful force in the universe. In addition to your contribution you might also like to become a practicing contributor. If so, you just might discover consciousness too. Then your own spiritual awakening and the benefits to your mind and body will inspire others in your own life.

I am appealing to the best in you. Whether you are twenty years old or eighty, you don't have to commit your entire life to this initiative to the extent that I have. This is my life’s work. However, your small contribution will resonate through the power of global awareness across millions of lives.

Once you put in something, even the smallest $5.00 contribution, then the astonishing testimonials of individuals who have benefited will be partly your doing, not just mine. You And I Will Share Something Special


"Can You Get This Done?"

I’m not a New York Times number one bestselling self-help author or celebrity “guru” in any sense. Still, this isn’t my first rodeo—or book either.  I have been personally preparing for this for a long time and have good reason to trust that the time has come. If you would like to sample for yourself a flavor of what I do for, then please have a look at my previous book on Amazon.

There is a “peek inside” preview here:
Book Preview @ Amazon

You are also welcome to sample the “Preface” of the new book here:
"From the Inside Out" Preface

"What If Contributions Exceed or Do Not Reach The Goal?"

If the campaign goal is not reached the funds will not go to waste. Contributions will still be applied to the project by priority. The website design and mobile app development comes first. The remaining "use of the contributions" will simply be scaled down in size until such time as book sales naturally make up the shortfall.

If there is any overage, then those amounts will roll-over in order to jump-start the second phase of an extended plan, as long as I believe it will complement current and future efforts. (Yes, this campaign is only a beginning.)

"Can One Little Book Make A Difference?"

Lack of human consciousness is not merely some inconvenient trait of a few indifferent people who harm nobody but themselves. It is a pandemic scourge that can jam traffic in the middle of the day or topple nations. It can spill milk on a just-washed floor or tear apart a family.


Each person who makes the decision to adopt a mindful lifestyle through the proposals in From The Inside Out  experiences a major overhaul of attitude. While one little book is not going to turn the earth into Shangri-La overnight, as each reader has his or her own personal transformation, a beginning is made.

One reader at a time, one family at a time, one community at a time, each person mindfully enabled through my book will help stem the tide in the current plague of mindlessness and unconscious living infecting our lives. It is already happening, right now.

Good attitudes are as contagious as bad ones. The combined outcomes of people individually maintaining their personal awareness would form a global aggregate of virtues expressing through morality and understanding that can only be discovered from within.

First this would alter the course of each person’s life and then the collective mankind.

I Am Not Going It Alone

When I write, I'm a one-man operation. Once the writing is done however, I’ve got to rely on other people to help get it out. Here are few folks who are better qualified than I for some specific tasks.

Social Media Manager/Interim Techie - There are several  prospects for this position under consideration. When it is filled, this page will be updated accordingly. This is a millennial professional, fully entrenched in the Social Media and computer tech culture, who will become a trusted provisional consultant. This person will  (i) advise and establish relationships with vendors to design and build my mobile app and website, (ii) get the technical aspects organized and keep everything on budget and (iii) advise on social media marketing strategies. This person will be a paid consultant initially for  90 days but that will be enough to get the momentum going and to train Nancy in some Social Media management. Who’s Nancy?

Nancy Schwarzhoff – Nancy is my wife. We've been married for thirty-five years. Yep, High School sweethearts. She will handle much of the promotional work. Not only is she an experienced executive and a wiz at organizing and scheduling but she thoroughly believes in and is committed to my work. Nancy will be setting up my meeting interviews, book signings, readings and helping out with the public relations side of this book. Nancy has come very far spiritually too. A daily practitioner of conscious contact with God through the consciousness exercise I present in my books, she has also undergone a miraculous transformation herself, overcoming some health conditions, including immunodeficiency disorders. Once on anti-depressant medications and other prescriptions, Nancy is now free from all of them. She carries that independence into her role as wife and mother. Yep, she’s the mother of two other team members, young Danny and my daughter Kristen.


Danny J. Schwarzhoff Jr. – Danny edits, proofreads and is amazing at graphic art production. Oh, and a writing critic extreme. Danny produced the graphic design, back and front covers for my last book and will be doing the same for From the Inside Out. He also does all my photography and videography. He shot the main “pitch” video at the top of this page. Danny will be an ongoing asset in this endeavor. At least until he goes off to college . He is a National Honor Society member and has his sights on some top schools.  Meanwhile for the purposes of this venture, he’s all ours!

Kristen Schwarzhoff - She may be just 14 but my daughter has been helping proofread my writing since she was in the fifth grade. She excels in English, loves to read and write and is a straight “A" honor roll student. Actually she is one of the best writers I personally know, even at her young age. Her skills will be valuable, as long as none of it interferes with her studies.

Media Relations Counsel -  I will be retaining a reputable media training firm. Even with years of experience as a public speaker and stage performer, I have to make sure that I can deliver a savvy message that is right for media broadcast. (If you remember what happened to Sen. Marco Rubio, in the middle of his GOP response to President Obama's 2013 State of the Union address then you know why this is a must.) Broadcast interview training will ensure that I communicate to media outlets succinctly and effectively.


There are Other Ways You Can Help Too

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help and receive help at the same time. The biggest way you can help without money is to:

1) Give consciousness a try

When others see how your life is coming together, that your anxieties and fears are falling away, how you are less affected by stress; and how vices and bad habits are suddenly just gone, you can tell them how it happened.

2) Don't forget to:

Like my Facebook page

Like the Facebook page of my last book

Like the Facebook page of my new book


Help Others Wake Up From the Dream

Too many of us are living inside a dream. Rather than discovering what is real, many of us have been conditioned to simply substitute one dream for another. Yet, even when a “bad” dream is swapped for a “good” one, it is still dreaming. Eventually a nightmare ensues.

Helping others find their way back, to regain lost reality, is what I do. Once people are shown exactly how to wake up from the dream and to surrender their fantasies, they experience the real world. They can take their rightful role in this divine creation.

There is a reality - really. Won’t you help me continue my work in helping others discover it?

If you would like to, then please become a contributor to this campaign and watch what happens.

Join us by clicking on your favorite perk and help change the game for us all.

Personal Note:  I am not a clinician. I am spiritual “practitioner”. I  approach problems from a metaphysical perspective, which is why I am so successful. My work is predicated upon the simple truth that once the spirit heals, both mind and body follow. However, no one need take my word for it. I can prove it. You may access documented evidence of miraculous physical and mental healing through God-Consciousness. You may download my personal medical history out of my last book, here: http://bit.ly/dannysmedicalfile

~ dan schwarzhoff

     feel like I have conscious contact with God. It certainly works - I feel
     the change and people around me are noticing the change."  -
     John L. - Salt Lake, UT
“I am absolutely amazed at how quick the meditation has
     worked on my ability to watch and not identify with ego. I have only been
     at it a couple of weeks and I feel only just scratched the surface. Thank
     you Danny.” - Pat C. - London, England
"Just wanted to drop a line to thank you for the
     meditation. My whole outlook has been taken to a whole new level since I
     started it, so thank you very much. I have turned others onto your link
     and they are seeing results as well." - Scott S. - Taylor, MI
"After I found your FB page, read your book, and
     did your meditation, I had a spiritual awakening. What I experienced is so
     hard to describe, but I feel through that experience and through my
     continued conscious contact with God, I am recovered." - Kelly T.
     - Hartford, Ct. 
Each of these testimonials is 100%
unsolicited.
"What
Is Needed?"
Your contribution into this campaign
is not going to be used to pay me a wage while I write a book. That leg of this endeavor is already done. The cost of
printing and production of From The Inside Out will be taken care
of by me, using my own resources, just as I did with my first book.
What your contribution will
do is something I cannot do on my own. It will help fund  key
marketing elements that are beyond production. These are tasks that must get
done to establish significant outreach and to get this message out. 
Your contribution will be prudently
allocated toward (i) social media, (ii) technology, (iii) promotional
activities, including a modest reading-signing tour and (iv) final editing to
ensure that From The Inside Out  is the finest quality possible.
I will see to it that the tiny
mustard seed of your help amplifies an improvement of consciousness among
people all over the world. This is a book you will find personal contentment from knowing you
had a hand in getting out, believe me. Please help me fan the sparks of
this avocation into a wildfire of consciousness that has already begun to alter
the courses of people's lives around the world.
"Why
Should This Be Done?"
This is really, really important. We all live in stress packed environments. Over time the pressure exerts a
cumulative effect on us. Each time we fail to react properly in the stream of
life we sustain an alteration of psyche. This amounts to a shift in attitude and
is behind every known emotionally based mental, physical distress. In a final analysis, at least 90% of all strife, poverty,
disease, war and every imaginable insanity and human misery can be linked to unconsciousness—people
not mindfully connected with their spiritual self. Before it gets better we may witness
a frightening rise in violence, pandemic infections, and insanity. We will lose faith and trust in once magnanimous institutions and governments. Some of us will remain unharmed and will even grow spiritually
through these disturbing trends—those of us who are conscious and who remain undisturbed.  
From The Inside Out is not a typical self-improvement proposition. With this
book we are venturing into the realm of metaphysics—addressing powerful forces
having an enormous impact on many people. Mindfully aware people: 


Live mentally and physically robust
lives. 


Are clear from the debilitating
effects of negative emotions and are free from fear.


Develop a powerful immunity to
stress and the deleterious effects of obsessive behavior and thinking. 


Are not stepping on the toes of their fellows causing harms wherever they go.


Don’t make strings of poor life decisions. 


Have solid, enriching relationships
with others—whether romantic, family, business or social.


Are free from morbid habits like overeating, over-sexing,
smoking, drinking and drugging. 


Exhibit intuitive discipline from within, without
emotional encumbrance, making our way peacefully and confidently on the path of
life. 

"What
Will This Look Like?" 
The website is going to be slammin’. Not only will it distribute
books but also mp3’s and other free downloads. Readers will also be able to
connect with each other and share their life changing experiences as the result
of my book through a discussion board. They will have easy access to my blogs
and any new videos I make. It’ll also capture emails for a
newsletter signup and there will be a high-end shopping mall where I can always
add new publications and recordings. 
The Mobile App will allow readers to have easier access to the Consciousness Exercise and materials—on the fly, so to speak. Anytime during the day where there are
dangers of dreaming or becoming mesmerized by life, a subscriber can easily
practice waking up.
Promotion – A lion’s share (over 40%) of your contribution
goes toward activities communicating the message of consciousness. This will
include social media integration and public relations activities such as
issuing press releases, making public appearances like book signings and
engaging local, national and international (UK) broadcast interviews on
television, radio and webcasts—as well as print media interviews in
newspapers, magazines and online publications. 
Editing – A final work-over will appraise the quality of “From the
Inside Out” prior to being published through "CreateSpace". A
professional will be contracted to provide a final assessment of the
manuscript, adjusting for style standards to ensure its strength."When
Will The Book Be Released?"
Anticipating late Fall and in time for Christmas
2014, “From the Inside Out” will be available on Amazon, Kindle, Barnes &
Noble and Nook—as well as through an expanded distribution network of
booksellers, schools and libraries throughout the U.S. and most of Europe.Breaking
It Down
What
You Will Get 

When you contribute, you’ll have the first copies of the book, or depending
on the perks you select, both of my books—plus some other really great perks, like
free access to the new streaming audio, audio downloads and more. Just have a
peek on the right side of this page and you’ll see. 
In For a Penny In For a Pound?
Perks are great, but of course this
campaign isn’t only about perks. Your interest also gives you access to
most powerful force in the universe. In addition to your contribution you might
also like to become a practicing contributor. If so, you just might
discover consciousness too. Then your own spiritual awakening and the benefits
to your mind and body will inspire others in your own life. 
I am appealing to the best in you.
Whether you are twenty years old or eighty, you don't have to commit your entire
life to this initiative to the extent that I have. This is my life’s work.
However, your small contribution will resonate through the power of global
awareness across millions of lives. 
Once you put in something, even the
smallest $5.00 contribution, then the astonishing testimonials of individuals
who have benefited will be partly your doing, not just mine. You And I Will Share Something Special"Can
You Get This Done?"
I’m not a New York Times number one
bestselling self-help author or celebrity “guru” in any sense. Still, this
isn’t my first rodeo—or book either.  I have been personally preparing for this for a
long time and have good reason to trust that the time has come. If you would
like to sample for yourself a flavor of what I do for, then please have a look
at my previous book on Amazon.
There is a “peek inside” preview
here:Book
Preview @ AmazonYou are also welcome to sample the “Preface” of the new book here:"From the Inside Out" Preface
"What
If Contributions Exceed or Do Not Reach The Goal?"
If the campaign goal is not reached
the funds will not go to waste. Contributions will still be applied to the
project by priority. The website design and mobile app development comes first.
The remaining "use of the contributions" will simply be scaled down in size
until such time as book sales naturally make up the shortfall. 
If there is any overage, then those amounts will roll-over in order to
jump-start the second phase of an extended plan, as long as I believe it will
complement current and future efforts. (Yes, this campaign is only a beginning.) 
"Can
One Little Book Make A Difference?"Lack of human consciousness is not
merely some inconvenient trait of a few indifferent people who harm nobody but
themselves. It is a pandemic scourge that can jam traffic in the middle of the
day or topple nations. It can spill milk on a just-washed floor or tear apart a
family. 
Each person who makes the decision to
adopt a mindful lifestyle through the proposals in From The Inside Out 
experiences a major overhaul of attitude. While one little book is not going to
turn the earth into Shangri-La overnight, as each reader has his or her own
personal transformation, a beginning is made. 
One reader at a time, one family at a
time, one community at a time, each person mindfully enabled through my book
will help stem the tide in the current plague of mindlessness and unconscious
living infecting our lives. It is already happening, right now.Good attitudes are as contagious as
bad ones. The combined outcomes of people individually maintaining their
personal awareness would form a global aggregate of virtues expressing through morality and understanding that can only be
discovered from within.

First this would alter the course of
each person’s life and then the collective mankind.I Am Not Going It Alone
When I write, I'm a one-man operation. Once the writing is done however, I’ve got to rely on other people to help get it out. Here are few folks who are better qualified than I for some specific tasks.Social Media Manager/Interim
Techie - There are several 
prospects for this position under consideration. When it is filled, this
page will be updated accordingly. This is a millennial professional, fully entrenched in the Social Media and 
computer tech culture,
who will become a trusted provisional consultant. This person will  (i) advise and establish relationships
with vendors to design and build my mobile app and website, (ii) get the 
technical
aspects organized and keep everything on budget and (iii) advise 
on social media marketing strategies.
This person will be a paid consultant initially for  90 days but 
that will be enough to get the momentum going and to train Nancy in 
some Social Media management. Who’s Nancy?

Nancy Schwarzhoff –
Nancy is my wife. We've been married for thirty-five years. Yep, High School
sweethearts. She will handle much of the promotional work. Not only is she an
experienced executive and a wiz at organizing and scheduling but she thoroughly
believes in and is committed to my work. Nancy will be setting up my meeting
interviews, book signings, readings and helping out with the public relations
side of this book. Nancy has come very far spiritually too. A daily
practitioner of conscious contact with God through the consciousness exercise I
present in my books, she has also undergone a miraculous transformation
herself, overcoming some health conditions, including immunodeficiency
disorders. Once on anti-depressant medications and other prescriptions, Nancy
is now free from all of them. She carries that independence into her role as
wife and mother. Yep, she’s the mother of two other team members, young Danny
and my daughter Kristen.
Danny J. Schwarzhoff Jr. –
Danny edits, proofreads and is amazing at graphic art production. Oh, and a
writing critic extreme. Danny produced the graphic design, back and front
covers for my last book and will be doing the same for From the Inside Out.
He also does all my photography and videography. He shot the main “pitch” video
at the top of this page. Danny will be an ongoing asset in this endeavor. At
least until he goes off to college . He is a National Honor Society member and
has his sights on some top schools.  Meanwhile for the purposes of this venture, he’s all ours!
Kristen Schwarzhoff - She may be just 14 but my daughter has been helping
proofread my writing since she was in the fifth grade. She excels in English,
loves to read and write and is a straight “A" honor roll student. Actually
she is one of the best writers I personally know, even at her young age. Her
skills will be valuable, as long as none of it interferes with her studies. 



Media Relations
Counsel -  I will be retaining a reputable
media training firm. Even with years of experience as a public speaker and
stage performer, I have to make sure that I can deliver a savvy message that
is right for media broadcast. (If you remember what happened to Sen. Marco Rubio,
in the middle of his GOP response to President Obama's 2013 State of the Union
address then you know why this is a must.) Broadcast interview training will
ensure that I communicate to media outlets succinctly and effectively. 
There
are Other Ways You Can Help Too
Some people just can’t contribute,
but that doesn't mean you can’t help and receive help at the same time. The
biggest way you can help without money is to: 
1)
Give consciousness a try
When others see how your life is
coming together, that your anxieties and fears are falling away, how you are less
affected by stress; and how vices and bad habits are suddenly
just gone, you can tell them how it happened.
2)
Don't forget to: 
Like my Facebook page
Like the Facebook page of my last book
Like the Facebook page of my new bookHelp Others Wake
Up From the Dream
Too many of us are living inside a
dream. Rather than discovering what is real, many of us have been conditioned
to simply substitute one dream for another. Yet, even when a “bad” dream is
swapped for a “good” one, it is still dreaming. Eventually a nightmare ensues.
Helping others find their way back,
to regain lost reality, is what I do. Once people are shown exactly how to wake up
from the dream and to surrender their fantasies, they experience the real world. They can take their rightful role in this divine creation.

There
is a reality - really. Won’t you help me continue my work
in helping others discover it? 

If you would like to, then please
become a contributor to this campaign and watch what
happens. 
Join us by clicking on your favorite
perk and help change the game for us all.



Personal Note:  I am not a
clinician. I am spiritual “practitioner”. I  approach problems from a 
metaphysical perspective, which is why I am so successful. My work is 
predicated upon the simple
truth that once the spirit heals, both mind and body follow. However, no
 one
need take my word for it. I can prove it. You may access documented 
evidence of
miraculous physical and mental healing through God-Consciousness. You 
may
download my personal medical history out of my last book, here: http://bit.ly/dannysmedicalfile
~ dan schwarzhoff

story:
Short Summary

My father was born in Indonesia in 1935 and​ lived in a happy Dutch family. His life was quite idyllic... However everything changed when the Japanese invaded ​ Indonesia​.  He and his family w​ere  placed into a concentration camp and they were forced to adapt to a harsh and new reality almost overnight​.

His story focuses on his own personal ​journey, ​not the whole family with 6 children

​As a child he witnessed so much cruelty during this time which impacted each member of the family quite differently. H​is thought life, however was uniquely his own and ​these make his story unique.

​There are so many stories of hardship during and in the aftermath of the war and everyone has to deal with the after effects of their experiences in their own way. In my Father's case, he fought to rid himself ​of the curse of the nightmares​, the hatred and the witness of mans cruelty to man...At a young age, he realised how these negatives impacted on his ability to learn, to relate to others and ​he wanted to ​“normalise” his emotions.

His story is like a diary of a six year old as he observed his young life unroll in wonder, innocence and then his idealism crushed by an invasion. In writing this story, he was forced to experience again the beauty and the horrors of his childhood and many chapters were written with his tears.

We need to raise about $7000 to enable us to edit, proof, set out and print Fran's book through a publisher. If you let me know if you have donated I will add your name to the list and you will get a copy once the book is published.

Frans is turning 80 in October and we would love to have this completed and present it to him then. The publisher told me that if I could get it to them by June it will well and truly be ready by his birthday. Frans doesn't know we are doing this and we would love to keep it a surprise.

We really appreciate your help here and look forward to fulfilling his dream. Thank you in anticipation of your support.  

We would also ask that you help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. You can actually use some of the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Beautiful Ashes

When a family scandal threatens everything Charlie knows, she'll journey to foreign countries, new phases of life, and even a past that haunts her to learn about love ....and forgiveness. 

Will she find beauty in the ashes?


Hello world! I am Meg Meredith. I have been writing since I was a kid, it's been my dream to publish the books that are in my head. And this summer, I'm am putting my first novel out via Amazon.com and Amazon Kindle and I need your help to do that!


My Campaign

  • In order to make this dream a reality, I need to raise $1700. This money pays for the editor and graphic designers that will help make this book look  amazing!
  • PERKS for contributing:
  • $10 or less= A HUGE thank you!
  • $20-30= A free kindle edition of "Beautiful Ashes"
  • $50= Your name mentioned in the thank you section of the book and a free kindle edition
  • $75= A signed copy of "Beautiful Ashes", your name mentioned in the thank you section,  and a free kindle edition.
  • $200= A character named after you in my next book, your name mentioned in the thank you section, a signed copy and a free kindle edition.
  • If I do not reach my goal by May 11th, whatever I do raise will still go toward the making of Beautiful Ashes.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Be my megaphones! Tell you friends, blog about it, post it a million times on Facebook, share this campaign with your friends and family, tweet about it, sing a song about it on youtube, do a puppet show about it with your kids…ok, just kidding about that last one, nobody is ready for puppets about Meg Meredith.

Thanks for joining me on this journey!

story:
Hi, my name is Lenka Miklova. Thanks for taking a look at my fundraising page! 

I am raising funds to go on a trip to Uganda, where I will volunteer with Youth With A Mission for one month. I will be working with children in the village of Jinja as well as at the village clinic. I will also be attending and working at the YWAM youth camp there. I will be working where-ever the projects need me!

www.ywamhopeland.org

I’ll share some of my story to help you understand why I want to go… I was born in the Czech Republic and grew up in a small village called Kelniky, near a town called Zlin in Southern Moravia. I have qualifications in technical economics, administration and nursing. I was raised in the Catholic tradition and all my life I’ve been inspired by Jesus and the way God has shown His love to us!

“Go out into the world today and love the people you meet. Let your presence light new light in the hearts of people.” - Mother Theresa

“Love grows by giving” and my love has been growing during my time in the UK. I have been living here for 10 years now, and since moving to Bournemouth I’ve been working with children who have special needs at Livability Victoria Education Centre. I have also volunteered at the Nightclub Chaplaincy, and at my church as a Eucharistic Minister and a Youth Group leader.

I have been praying about my vocation for 5 years and God has always spoken to me about going to Africa to work with children, young people, the poor and the sick. Sadly, due to poor health, I have not been able to go and spend time there until now.

HEALING STORY

About 7 years ago I hurt my back really badly at work by lifting people I was caring for. I suffered for 5 years with a lot of pain, and I had to take medication every day. As a result of the long-term pain my body also developed depression. I decided to go for a retreat and God spoke to me about healing of my pain. I couldn't imagine how that could happen because I had tried so many treatments and types of medication. After the retreat I went back home to Kelniky for a holiday and met with a priest, who prayed for my healing. Accidentally I did not take enough pain relief medication for the duration of my holiday. Without that medication the pain would usually cause me to shake and feel physically sick. I would hardly be able to move, and I wouldn't be able sleep. When I returned back from holiday to the UK after two weeks I realized my back pain was gone! It was hard to believe and understand what had happened. I put all my medication into the bin and said I do not need any medication I need Jesus! :) My life has changed! I am able to dance again, skate, cycle, run, walk, socialize and smile! :)     

So now that I’m able to do all these things I’ve decided to go to finally go to Africa! To Uganda, to be precise, where I can serve people in the way I’ve been inspired to! 

WHY I’M GOING ON THIS TRIP   -  to make difference in the world, to serve one another, to make new friends, to build self-esteem, to develop my skills, new experience, help people, feel needed and appreciated, share life with others, to have a fun, to do something different, to know God and Make Him known.


So this is where I need your help. I need to raise £1500 towards my travel and accommodation costs, vaccinations. Here’s a cost breakdown so you can see what I’ll be spending…

Coach to Airport: £31.00

Flights: £933.86

Extra Travel between villages and projects: £100.00

Accomodation & Food: £217

Health Insurance: £30

Vaccinations: £178.50

Every little penny helps. I’ll be fundraising all month, doing things from a Supper Club to chores and jobs on request - all to raise money for my trip! I will also do the following for donations over £30!

I will send a personal postcard from Uganda: £30 

I will bring you back some traditional African Beads: £40

I will bring you back a traditional African Scarf/Fabric: £50

I will cook you a traditional Czech/Ugandan Dinner and tell you first hand stories of what I got up to in Jinja! £100+

Any money I raise over my target will go towards the projects I working with in Uganda!

If you are not able to donate pennies then please send a prayer. This will be a big journey for me!

If you an unable to donate, please help me to share this link, will really appreciate it! 

MANY   THANKS.   GOD BLESS! 

‘’Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great   love!’' -       Mother Teresa

story:
Click below to listen to the audio Prologue read by the author.

What is Shiva XIV?

With intrigue, romance, magical creatures, and mysticism, Lyra Shanti's "Shiva XIV" takes you on a fantastic journey through the eyes of Ayn: a boy destined to save his galaxy, but only if he can face the truth of his mysterious, long ago past. Book one begins with Ayn's origin and follows his journey throughout the series. Three books are planned, as well as a possible fourth! 


What is Being Said About the Book:

"Having been given sneak peaks into the whole series, I'm here to tell you how great Shiva XIV is! What sets Shiva XIV apart for me is the way Lyra has combined her intuitive knowledge of human nature with her ability to create very believable worlds. I did not just find interesting characters in this story, but long lost friends who are now very real to me. Shiva is a labor of love on Lyra's part, and that love shines through every line of it. 
There is something for everyone in this story: Adventure, Philosophy, Love, Betrayal, Religion, Spirituality, Disillusionment, and worlds of wonder that have never been shown to anyone before. 
The world of Shiva XIV NEEDS to be experienced by the world as it holds, not only great beauty and eloquence, but also great insights and lessons in tolerance, and many of the dilemmas facing our own world today. I have always felt that the sign of a good Science Fiction or Fantasy story is if it gives insight into the reader's own life and world while at the same time appearing to take them far away from it. In this, Shiva XIV succeeds with flying colors! 
So if you want to support a brilliant writer and make a great book series a reality, Donate now and spread the word!" ~ Jennifer Juniper Varon, Visual Artist. 

How Will Your contributions Be Spent & How Will it Help the Book Succeed?

All funds collected through this campaign will be used for publication and promotion of the book. Expenses such as multiple copies of the book (needed for book readings), web page fees, social network advertising, and other such promotional tools will be utilized by the author, only possible with the contributions from this campaign. You can help to make it all happen!

story:
Short Summary

The Warrior Heart Magazine is a magazine focused on sharing poems, short stories, articles and interviews about military service members, veterans and their loved ones.  The Editor-In-Chief is Marine Corps Combat Veteran Andrew R. Jones and he represents The Warrior Heart Magazine team of Editors.  He is also a Best-Selling Author and subject of an Emmy Award winning news story based on overcoming his struggles with PTSD and the release of his book, Healing the Warrior Heart.  

The entire team is comprised of Veterans from the Army and Marine Corps as well as one of the greatest Veteran supporters they have ever come to know.  Each one of them provides a unique touch to the magazine and is highly dedicated to seeing the success of the mission, which is: 

To give military service members and veterans a creative outlet to process combat exposure and the ability to present their opinions on current events in a way that bridges the gap between civilians and veterans by gaining a much needed understanding of one another.  

The Vision:

The primary vision of The Warrior Heart is to share the creative outlets and current events opinions of military veterans so other veterans and service members will have a sense of community in knowing they are not alone with their thoughts and struggles. 

The secondary vision of The Warrior Heart is to bridge the gap between civilians and veterans.  We will do this by giving civilians information on current events through the perspective of a veteran and by sharing the successes of veterans so civilians will have exposure to the positive lives veterans lead, as opposed to the negativity shown on mainstream media outlets.  This will let civilians gain a better understanding of their veterans, allowing them to reach out and help in ways they may have not thought of before. 

By utilizing social media, partnering with Veteran Non-Profit organizations, military affiliated organizations and privately owned book stores and coffee shops, The Warrior Heart will gain mass exposure and spread its message world-wide with the vision of becoming a publication found in every store and on every Internet resource available. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need the ability to mass produce hard copies of this amazing publication, the ability to keep our website running as well as our digital publishing website with Joomag and to effectively advertise and gain exposure through a multitude of outlets.  By giving us the ability, through donations, to mass produce hard copies, we can then flood every VA, every Vet Center, every public library, every American Legion, every Marine Corps League, every VFW Post and anywhere else we see fit, with monthly copies of The Warrior Heart.  We can hand out issues to individuals on the streets or to families.  Our goal is not to make a ton of money from this magazine, our goal is to spread the word we have to offer and to eventually bring in enough money to keep running.  

As for perks for your donations, we don't have much to offer to be honest.  I don't want this campaign to be about the perks for your donation, but to be about your donation helping those in need.  By allowing us the ability to mass produce hard copies, you are allowing those who are in a dark place to receive a copy of the magazine which will then guide them to a better way of life and understanding.  
We are offering some cool small perks though, so be sure to check them out and claim yours with your donation.  Please help spread the word of our funding campaign.  Much love and God bless.  Faith and Focus.

story:
Do you remember that dusty old cookbook your mother and grandmother loved so much, where they would write down the next best thing you were going to eat?

Well, it's time to clean all that dust off and give them something new, something to bring their passion back to life!

 

Our goal?

My team and I want to create the most amazing and easy to use app for mothers, grandmothers and all the food lovers out there.

Our vision is to make a clean, simple and beautifully designed interface, with loads of functionality that is free of ads and free of charge.

Let's share what the app is all about:

- a simple and easy to use interface

- adding recipes, including images, ingredients list, cooking methods and more

- editing existing recipes

- browsing your own recipes through search or categories

- sharing your recipes through social media

- sending recipes to friends and family through e-mail

- and many many more

 

Where will it be available?

We are going to first implement it for Windows 8 and Windows Phone and we hope in the near future to have it on all the major platforms.

 

Why do we need your help?

You know how hard beginnings are. Well, we are at the beginning and your help will be much appreciated.

As we do not have other types of funding and we want this app to be free of charge, we decided to come to you. We think the perks we created are a great way to thank you for your support and we are more than eager to start cooking in your name!

 

Thank you!

We would like to thank you in advance for your support. It means the world to us!

 

Best regards,

Mihai Iova

story:
"The Obama Administration and American
Foreign Policy in East Africa"
&
"Uganda Rises: Protest and Civil Society Movements
in a Rapidly Changing Region"

The depiction of Uganda in the media and amongst the public, thanks in large part to the over-simplistic and possibly counter-productive "Kony2012" film, does not reflect the realities on the ground in today's Uganda nor address the defining events which have occurred there recently. One of those events was the 2011 elections in Uganda and resulting violent crackdown by the government of President Museveni. Combined with the rapidly deteriorating economic situation, this led to nationwide anti-government protests that coincided with the beginning of the 'spring revolutions' in North Africa. This renewed opposition, together with the emergence of stronger civil society groups and major societal changes, has shaken the 26 year rule of the Museveni government.

One year on from the beginning of the protests in Uganda, and with rising opposition to long-standing leaders elsewhere in Africa (such as in Senegal and Congo), I have been invited to speak to two upcoming conferences about my experience observing the flawed 2011 elections and researching in the middle of the protests and unrest, as well as to address broader issues concerning the human rights situation in the country. Unfortunately there is no funding for presenters to travel and attend

What Your Support Means & Why It's Important

"Security forces beat or shot over 30 journalists, confiscated audio recorders and cameras, and deleted images of the violence." - Amnesty International on Ugandan protests

An essential duty of a human rights defender is to speak out. Uganda is ranked 139th in the world in press freedom and I believe those who have the ability and capacity to speak about what they have witnessed have a duty to do so. I've felt the effects of the tear gas, I've seen security forces shoot at and beat unarmed civilians, and I've been harassed myself, but - above all: I've been given an opportunity to speak.

America views Uganda as a key military ally and strategic partner in the region. This has been further deepened in order to support Ugandan involvement in the conflict in Somalia and by the recent deployment of the American equipment and troops strongly advocated for in the 'Kony2012' film. Having the opportunity to share my research and first-hand experience with others at these conferences will help generate discussion about the consequences of this partnership and raise awareness of ongoing human rights issues amongst key American academics and policy makers - influencing thought leaders to better take action to defend human rights.

In addition, presenters will be invited to publish their work in a book on American Foreign Policy and/or in the Canadian Journal of African Studies. Attending this conference also allows me to make contacts which can assist with future projects related to the study of international affairs.

See this article about the protests and government response from The Guardian

**UPDATE**On Wednesday April 4th the Government of Uganda invoked Penal Code Section 56(2) and declared Activists for Change (A4C), and those involved in Walk to Work protests, an ‘unlawful society’. Anyone proved to be a member will be jailed for 7 years, anyone publishing materials deemed to “support” A4C will be jailed for 3 years, and possession of any documents relating to the protest organization or attendance at protests is also deemed an offence.  I believe both this and the tabled Public Order Management Bill violates the Constitution of Uganda - written by this very government and President – and of course violates various human rights treaties and international laws. Likely as importantly, it just won’t succeed. Regardless, I will continue to speak with those involved on all sides, to try to be able to attend these conferences, and to speak openly about what I have witnessed or experienced.

About the Conferences

Academics, independent scholars, and policymakers will present papers at a conference on the theme, “U.S. Foreign Policy in Africa in the 21st Century.” The keynote speaker is Dr. Toyin Falola, award winning scholar of African and Diasporan African history, and Professor of History at the University of Texas
April 2012

The Canadian Association of African Studies is hosting a 3-day conference bringing together an international group of specialists across disciplines and between professionals based in both North and South
May 2012

Full Cost Breakdown

*Conference registration fee = $50
*Accommodation = $100 (total for 2 nights)
*Travel to US= $350 (most cost effective method: one-way flight + 28hr Greyhound for return)

Costs I’ve already covered = food and other expenses, ground transportation such as taxi/bus, project fees and fulfilling all perks to contributors, preliminary research trips and all costs of research/tuition over past years

Any funds raised above $500 will be used for costs associated with attending the 2012 Canadian Association of African Studies Annual Conference, where I have also been invited to present.

*Accommodation: $150 (total for 3 nights)
*Conference registration fee = $120
*Travel to Quebec City = $80

story:
Short Summary

Mama said there'd be days like this.  Well maybe not exactly like this, but close.  She did say days, though, which means more than one.  These are the rambling thoughts of TJ Scoggings as he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

Like many African Americans, TJ, a fifteen year old teenager, also shares Native American ancestry but has paid very little attention to his family history.

TJ possesses strong intuition and has vivid dreams but these gifts make no sense until tragedy strikes. Only when TJ embraces both cultures will he be able to overcome his feelings of hurt, anger and victimization, save a friends life and start a new life of his own.

I'm Teddy Mathis.  I've been a single mom.  Now I'm a grandmother and semi-retired adjunct professor.

 My life joys are in the areas of cultural diversity and spirituality.  The Homecoming of TJ Scoggings, is my first attempt at continuing my bliss in print.

 

What I Need & What You Get

My goal is to publish this book with a traditional publisher and develop an income to publish more books with cultural and spiritual twists.

The funds raised will be for pre-publication editing, proof copies $1,600; a

new computer mine is dying $600; professional consultants for  video,

marketing and a graphic designer for proof cover and bookmarks $1,800.

My perks include a thank you e-mail, a TJ bookmark; a copy of the first chapter; signed proof copies; your name in the acknowledgments and a chance to name a character.

The Impact

The dynamics of many different cultures living together is rich with stories of romance, mystery and drama that have not yet been told. I hope this story and future ones will help people realize how connected we really are.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can't contribute just now, but you can still help by spreading the word about my campaign. Thanks a bunch.

story: ..

Who we are

Our team is a startup based in Hungary. We are IT and GIS specialists, online experts and UX designers, but first of all, we are pilgrims.

Our mission

We try to help pilgrims.

The solution

eCamino team is creating smartphone application to GPS-enabled devices and a web portal backend solution based on John Brieley’s very successful pilgrim guide book.

The smartphone apps will available soon in iOS, Android and WP8 platforms.

The application is an offline tool which supports navigation and all the useful information which needed for a pilgrim on the way (location based content, accommodation, food,things to see…) and gives spiritual guidance. This is a reliable mobile companion on the road, and can work without mobile internet connection also. It helps in emergency. Shares useful information, news and give feedback for others. We support the user generated content (pictures, voice, POI and track info) and build the community with the assistance of the platform.

We connect the pilgrims on the road, and also with people who are following the story from home.

eCamino is an end-to-end solution. We support pilgrims before the journey on the road and after coming home.


 

The first products in English  language will available in spring 2014

The next steps are to add new features, other languages and other Camino routes also later in 2014.

story:
WE ALL HAVE DREAMS --------- LET’S ALL CHASE THEM

No matter who you are or how old you are we all have dreams and we all deserve to be able to chase them

  • Maybe you dreamt of being a professional athlete, actor/actress, doctor, lawyer,  

  or successful businessman.

  • Maybe someone said you weren’t good enough to obtain your particular dream.
  • Maybe your circumstances aren’t allowing you to think outside the box so that you can chase your dreams.
  • Or maybe you have held hatred for someone that has hurt you in the past for so long that it has clouded your ultimate vision for your life.

Now imagine if Michael Jordan, Oprah Winfrey, Bill Gates, or Christopher Gardner had given up on their dreams. Would we know who they are today???

You have what it takes to reach your goals and dreams you just have to believe it can be done.

My name is Dovev Weaver Sr. A.K.A. (Coach D) and I am a husband, father, son, friend, author, mentor, entrepreneur, speaker, and most important of all a child of God.

Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to visit the Chasing Your Dreams Campaign. This campaign is designed to get funding for my first major project as an author. The full title of the book is “Chasing Your Dreams: What Every Dreamer Should Know.” This campaign is very important to me because I believe no one can reach their full potential in life until they learn how to forgive the people that have hurt them in the past so that they can move on in life. When you help me get this dream campaign funded you will be contributing to me chasing one of my dreams which was to become a published author. I already have a company that wants to publish my book and help me get off to a great start in my speaking career.


This book was written for:

  • People that have never chased their dreams before
  • People laid-off from their jobs that want to chase their dreams
  • People fed-up with their current employers and want to chase their own dreams
  • People seeking a new start in a field they dreamed of
  • People that are developing their passion in life
  • People that have been told to not pursue their dreams
  • People that have given up on their dreams because of hardships

This book teaches the reader how to use my 3 phase process to chase your dreams including:

  • How to manifest your dreams
  • How to create your vision
  • How to take massive action
  • Who to network with while going after your dreams
  • The 5 Components to complete a great vision
  • How to develop a winning mindset
  • Showing the importance of personal development
  • How to set S.M.A.R.T. Goals
  • How to define your purpose in life
  • And a lot more

We need your help!

Together we need to raise $7000 to cover the cost of publishing a high-quality book and distribution to those in need. The funds you contribute will help pay for copywriting, proofreading, print and digital formatting, cover design, editing, securing an ISBN number, printing, and distribution. 

It's a big number, but I KNOW we can reach or exceed it!

Who do you know that has a dream inside of them that needs to be awakened?

  • You’re spouse?
  • You’re sister?
  • You’re brother?
  • You’re mother?
  • You’re father?
  • You’re best friend?
  • You’re Co-Worker?
  • Yourself?

Do it for them. Your donation, whatever the size, will help people all over the United States that are trying to chase their dreams.

What's in it for you?

The biggest perk you will receive is the satisfaction of knowing you're helping thousands of people improve their lives. But we would also like to reward your generosity in a tangible way.

$10    Thank You Sponsor

We are so appreciative of your support. For your support

I will send you a personalized email.

$25    Motivated Sponsor

A personalized email from me and

 An Autographed copy of the Book or an E-book.

$50    Application Sponsor

You get my unique FREE Downloadable

Workbook to assist you achieve your dreams and

No matter who you are or how old you are we all have dreams and

     that are developing their passion in life

     that have been told to not pursue their dreams

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

(video music credit)

The Story So Far ...

We are very, very close to completing Little Girl and The Hill - a hand-illustrated, children's e-book about the dangers of chasing perfection.

This book was born from our own experiences with perfectionism, and the hope that a simple story could teach others how to embrace the present moment and enjoy more of what is - not just what could be.


Help Us Publish Little Girl and The Hill

All of the funds we raise will go toward getting the book into final production, and published and distributed through Graphicly.

The funding breakdown:

  • $150 for book production/distribution
  • $125 for purchasing an ISBN 
  • $300 for hiring a copy editor

Anything over our fundraising will goal will initially help us expand our promotional strategy, but if we manage to raise $1000 or more over our goal, we'll apply the funds to the formatting, design and production costs to publish a kick ass print version of the book.


Other Ways You Can Support

If you'd like to support this project but can't donate to the cause, you can help us a ton by simply sharing our campaign using the Indiegogo share tools above.


The Impact 

When Amber and I launched We Craft Stories, we had no idea what to expect from the journey.

We were two artists who had neglected our work for years out of fear - stalling and waiting for the right time or right inspiration to swoop down and carry us to the desk.

Now we're pushing ahead - leaning into that great unknown. 

Your support will empower us to take that final step and turn what once was a distant goal into reality.

Thank you!

story:
¿Por qué ultra-pasteurizar la leche materna donada?/Why to ultra-pasteurize donated breast milk?

Todos los recién nacidos tienen el sistema inmunológico inmaduro, especialmente los bebés prematuros, quienes además tienen el aparato digestivo inmaduro también. La naturaleza ha diseñado la leche de la madre adecuada a la edad gestacional del bebé, para ellos es importante recibirla, sin embargo, existe un alto número de madres que por alguna razón no pueden alimentar a sus bebés con su propia leche. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All newborn babies have immature immune system, especially premature babies, who also have immature digestive tract. Nature has designed the appropriate mother's milk depending on the gestational age of the baby, so it is important for them to receive it; however, there is a large number of mothers who, for some reason, are unable to feed their babies with their own milk. 


Durante los últimos años el uso de bancos de leche ha incrementado, aumentando también el uso de leche donada para alimentar infantes enfermos y prematuros. Sólo la madre natural del bebé hospitalizado debe proveer la leche para éste,  en los casos en los que la madre no pueda proveer de leche al recién nacido, se puede utilizar leche materna donada pero esta debe ser pasteurizada debido al riesgo de posible transmisión viral de citomegalovirus (CMV). El CMV se encuentra distribuido mundialmente y la infección depende de varios factores como: los inmunológicos, económicos y sociales. La incidencia de seropositividad de CMV en la población adulta en los países en vías de desarrollo se encuentra entre 80 y el 100%, mientras que en los países desarrollados es menor y oscila entre 60 y 80%. Los pacientes inmunosuprimidos son los de mayor riesgo de morbi-mortalidad y este grupo incluye a los inmunológicamente inmaduros como los recién nacidos,  siendo en este grupo los recién nacidos prematuros, un grupo de alto riesgo de contagio de CMV. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

During the last years the use of milk banks has increased, increasing also the use of donated milk to feed premature and sick babies. Only the biological mother of the hospitalized baby must provide milk for him. In cases when the mother cannot provide milk for the baby, donated breast milk may be used, but it must be pasteurized due to the risk of possible viral transmission of Cytomegalovirus (CMV). CMV is distributed globally and infection depends on several factors such as: immunological, economic and social. The incidence of CMV seropositivity in the adult population in developing countries is between 80 and 100%, while in the developed countries is less and ranges between 60 and 80%. Immunosuppressed patients are in high risk of morbidity and mortality. This group includes to the immunologically immature as the newborn, and newborn premature babies, who are in high risk of transmission of CMV. 


Si bien la infección de CMV suele cursar sin ningún tipo de síntomas, entre 10 y 15% de los casos puede dar lugar a enfermedad clínica en el recién nacido, incluye problemas de audición en el 30-65% de los casos sintomáticos, y constituye así la causa más frecuente de sordera neurosensorial de origen no hereditario. Incluso, en aquellos sin enfermedad evidente al nacer, el CMV puede ser responsable de algún tipo de secuelas a largo plazo.

La pasteurización Holder de leche materna es un método ampliamente recomendado para evitar la transferencia de infección por CMV en leche obtenida en bancos de leche. Son varias las evidencias que muestran los efectos benéficos en la seguridad de la leche materna pasteurizada, sin embargo, está perfectamente documentado que este método de pasteurización también inactiva componentes biológicos, así como propiedades nutrimentales  y  anticuerpos, entre ellos anticuerpos Anti-CMV, que los recién nacidos requieren o podrían requerir.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

While CMV infection tends to pursue without any symptoms, between 10 and 15% of the cases may result in clinical disease in the newborn, including hearing problems in 30-65% of symptomatic cases, thus it is the most frequent cause of non hereditary sensorineural deafness. Even in those without apparent disease at birth, CMV may be responsible for some kind of long-term damages.

Holder pasteurization of Breastmilk is a widely recommended method to avoid the transfer of CMV infection in milk obtained from milk banks. There are several evidences that show beneficial effects on the safety of pasteurized breast milk; however, it is documented that this method also inactives biological components, as nutritional properties and neutralizing antibodies thatnewborns require.


Por lo anterior, es necesario fabricar un equipo de ultra-pasteurización de leche materna que inactive el CMV pero también que preserve los nutrientes y anticuerpos que los bebés necesitan. Actualmente, hemos diseñado un equipo ultrapasteurizador de leche materna, sin embargo, necesitamos de tu apoyo para poder realizar el prototipo y demostrar que este método es mucho mejor que el método tradicional.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Therefore, it is necessary to create an ultra-pasteurization of breast milk device that not only inactivates the CMV, but also that preserves nutrients and antibodies that babies need. Currently, we have designed the device; however, we need your support to make the prototype and demonstrate that this method is much better than the traditional one.


¿Cómo funciona el equipo ultrapasteurizador? /

How does ultra-pasteurizer equipment work?

Todo funciona mediante un sistema robótico controlado y cerrado que proporciona choques térmicos a temperaturas extremas en un tiempo muy corto. El choque choque térmico es controlado mediante un sistema que en ningún momento tiene contacto con la leche por lo que no es contaminada durante el proceso. Durante el procedimiento se utiliza como referencia y retroalimentación de temperaturas al sistema, un fluido con densidad, punto de ebullición y fusión igual a la leche materna para no desperdiciar el líquido.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everything works using a controlled and closed robotic system that provides thermal shocks to extreme temperatures in a very short time. The thermal shock is controlled by a system which never has contact with the milk, so it is not contaminated during the process. In the procedure, a fluid with density, and boiling and melting point same as those of the breast milk are used as a reference and feedback of temperatures of the system for not to wastthe liquid.

Ultra-pasteurizador: Uno de los principales obstáculos es la financiación / Ultra-pasteurizer: One of the major obstacles is funding

El ultrapasteurizador de leche materna es una iniciativa que hemos emprendido egresados del Instituto Politécnico Nacional en México en colaboración con expertos en el tema y ha sido financiado con recursos propios a través de "freelance", sin embargo, nos encontramos en una etapa en donde es necesario invertir más recursos para fabricar el primer prototipo piloto.

Hemos planeado tanto como sea posible para el exito de este proyecto. El siguiente paso importante es recaudar los fondos necesarios para adquirir los dispositivos y material necesario para el prototipado y realizar las primeras pruebas beta para evaluar el desempeño y la calidad de la leche materna después del proceso.

Para el primer prototipo requerimos recaudar $40,000 dólares que serán destinados para materiales, herramientas y pruebas clínicas microbiológicas, virológicas, entre otros estudios.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The ultra- pasteurizer breast milk is an initiative that we, graduates from the Instituto Politécnico Nacional in Mexico, have undertaken in collaboration with experts in the field. The project has been financed with our own resources through "freelance"; however, we are at a stage where it is necessary to invest more resources to manufacture the first pilot prototype.

We have planned as much as possible to the success of this project. The next important step is to raise the necessary funds to acquire the devices and equipment for prototyping and make the first beta testing to evaluate the performance and quality of breast milk after the process.

For the first prototype, we need to raise $40,000 dollars which will be used for materials, tools, microbiological and virological clinical tests, among other studies.

Ayudar donando / Help by Donating

Dona cualquier cantidad que puedas. Este es un proyecto innovador que cambiará el curso de la alimentación de los bebés en el mundo. ¡Se parte de ella!

¡Ayudemos a que los bebés enfermos y prematuros puedan consumir leche materna donada de calidad para su crecimiento y desarrollo!

Nota: Si eres de cualquier otro país que no sea Estados Unidos, al momento de hacer la donación automáticamente hace la conversión de tu moneda nacional a dólares.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Donate whatever amount you can. This is a ground-breaking project that will change the course of feeding babies in the world. Be a part of it!

Let's help to sick and premature infants can consume quality donated breast milk for their growth and development!

Ayudar compartiendo / Help by Sharing

¡Comparte esta compaña con tus amigos, familia y colegas en todo el mundo a través de email y redes sociales!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Share this campaign with your friends, family and colleagues around the world via email and social media!

Ultrapasteurizador en los medios / Ultra-pasteurizer in the media

¡El ultra pasteurizador de leche materna ya ha generado ruido e interés! /The breast milk ultra-pasteurized has generated considerable buzz and interest already!

México:

  • CONACYT Prensa: Mexicanos desarrollan primer ultrapasteurizador de leche materna
  • Noticias MVS: Buscan ultrapasteurizar leche materna 
  • Investigación y Desarrollo: Buscan desarrollar primer ultrapasteurizador de leche materna
  • Fundación Carlos Slim: Researchers Work on Ultra-Pasteurization Equipment for Breast Milk

Nuestro equipo / Our Team

Somos un equipo de ingenieros mexicanos egresados del Instituto Politécnico Nacional y del Tecnológico de Orizaba conformado por dos ingenieros mecatrónicos (Mario Alberto Camilo y  Andrés Leal), tres ingenieros en robótica (Alejandro Hernández Pérez, Nathán Martínez Castelán  y Victor Arellano Quintana), un ingeniero en Sistemas Computacionales (Miguel Cortés Sarmiento), un ingeniero en informática (Luis Gustavo Miranda) y un Doctor que actualmente es Jefe del área de Neonatología del Hospital de la Mujer (José Luis Cruz). Somos un equipo multidisciplinario con experiencia en procesos de manufactura, desarrollo de hardware, firmware, control, sistemas y área médica.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We are a team of Mexican engineers graduated from the  Instituto Politécnico Nacional and Tecnológico de Orizaba formed by two Mechatronics engineers (Mario Alberto Camilo and Andrés Leal), three Robotics engineers (Alejandro Hernández Pérez, Nathán Martínez Castelán and Víctor Arellano Quintana), an Computer Systems engineer (Miguel Cortés Sarmiento),  an Informatics engineer  (Luis Gustavo  Miranda) and a Doctor who is currently Head of the department of Neonatology of the  Hospital for Woman (José Luis Cruz). We are a multidisciplinary team with experience  in manufacturing processes, development of hardware, firmware, control, systems and medical area.
