story:
¿Qué?

Polvo de estrellas nos sumerge en un mundo dominado por las emociones humanas...

¿Qué puede pasar si juegas con esas energías que ni conoces y por lo tanto eres incapaz de controlar? ¿Hacer que los demás paguen caro tu inconsciencia? Claro que ello te puede cambiar la percepción sobre lo ya conocido, pero también conducirte hasta los mismísimos infiernos. Varios protagonistas de esta historia, pertenecientes a distintas generaciones pasarán por ello. Se verán obligados a un cambio demasiado profundo, jamás experimentado. Pero hasta que el colectivo en general no tome conciencia de su misión, encontrando esa coherencia interna, las cosas no podrán cambiar. Serán incapaces de salir del estado en el que se han visto envueltos. Porque ahí es donde radica todo: en la simple pero enorme unidad del Universo.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Reme Cuéllar.

Natural de Medina del Campo (Valladolid), es autora de numerosas novelas, relatos y una obra de teatro. También ha escrito el guion de un cortometraje (El translúcido), poesía en español, francés e inglés («The Christmas Word» poema ganador en un concurso) y algún ensayo. En 1988 su relato «¡Silencio! Se duerme» obtuvo el reconocimiento del jurado en el Primer Certamen de Relatos Breves de Mujer (Ayto de Valladolid) y está publicado en un libro con dicho nombre. Es coautora (tanto en textos como en fotografías) de la realización del libro: Moraleja de las Panaderas (Diputación de Valladolid). Seleccionada en el I Concurso Internacional de Haikus y en otros cinco concursos, tiene publicados sus microrrelatos y su haiku en sus correspondientes libros. Durante un año fue parte integrante del equipo de redacción de la revista Ceteribus Paribus de la Facultad de Ciencias Económicas de Valladolid y un cuento suyo, «Nita y su libro mágico», fue visionado en la Semana de los derechos de la infancia en Medina del Campo. Desde hace unos años imparte, de manera puntual o continua, diversos talleres literario creativos.

Con Polvo de estrellas la autora, basándose en algunas experiencias y hechos reales, nos muestra de manera novelada que a veces la realidad no es ni como creemos que es o nos la contaron. 

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Con unos segundos de diferencia a esta angustiosa vivencia, surgió de repente otra. Algo estaba transformando esa aceleración obligándola a deslizarse de forma más pausada y suave. David, obligado por su mente a tomar conciencia de cualquier sensación experimentada fue tocado justo en lo más profundo de su ser. ¡Qué agradable bienestar le estaba proporcionando la corteza de ese chopo! ¡Y qué intensa! Se encontraba ante un gran almacén de energía. El joven se dio la vuelta y abrazó con fuerza el tronco. Aparte de no caerse así podría disfrutar mejor del momento. La consistencia de la realidad había comenzado a ponerse un poco rara. Llovían… ¡colores! Verdes, violetas y azules. Danzando en plena armonía. Y ese árbol se estaba transformando en algo blando y gelatinoso. Y muy sedoso. Tanto que su suavidad se filtraba por todo su ser. Era un objeto tremendamente confortable. ¡Como para separarse de él! Esta otra realidad era muy distinta a la que conocía, pero no le importaba. ¿Qué más daba que los colores no existieran como tal o los sonidos tampoco? ¿Qué mal había en ver más allá de las tres conocidas dimensiones? Se encontraba muy bien. Era lo importante. 
                El sentido del olfato era ahora el sentido al que mayor atención le estaba prestando el joven. En el entorno, los diferentes aromas que lo rodeaban estaban llegando al foco de su conciencia a raudales. Uno en concreto, por penetrante e inusual, había impregnado el lugar con un olor especial. A David le recordó al color verde oscuro si es que éste se pudiera oler. Allí se respiraba naturaleza, vida. Aquella fragancia le envolvió por completo y, aparte de equilibrarlo, le había dado… ¡la bienvenida!
                Todo lo que le rodeaba empezó a vibrar ante él. David no tuvo necesidad de tocar nada para poder sentir aquello de forma muy intensa. Y aunque estaba oscuro, el chico no tenía ningún problema en estar viendo circular la savia por las venas de los árboles y las pulsaciones de los colores navegando por el aire. O los sonidos que se escuchaban volverse a convertir en brillantes colores como si fueran flujos nebulosos en movimiento. Todo se combinaba y mezclaba comprendiéndose mutuamente. El joven se hallaba en un inmenso jardín sin flores, pero bañado con mil fragancias diferentes. Y no es que lo estuviera “viendo” sino que ese jardín estaba floreciendo en él. Y eran muchas plantas y a la vez una sola como si todo fuera el mismo ser, pero a la vez se conservara la individualidad de cada forma. Todo olor, sonido o color David podía saborearlo con una exquisita e inconfundible facilidad. Los estaba contemplando en toda su plenitud. Y por primera vez ya no había mundo sino universo: un único latir, un solo corazón. La totalidad era mayor que cada una de sus partes. ¡Increíble! El joven se sintió especial, único. Ser capaz de apreciar todo aquello era una sensación irrepetible. Muy, muy particular. Algo mágico. ¡Maravilloso! Le causaba gran placer».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción RESPALDAR es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona a la autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Reme Cuéllar vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
To Publish My Book

Your support will help me begin the publishing process for my book.The cost includes the editor, (big cost), copy editor who works with the final style and book details, including grammar, words and corrections, before the proof reader does the last overview. Finally it arrives to be formatted, the process which involves everything about the creation of the physical book design, both the inner and outer, including the cover, spine and back cover, which includes all the writing details on both the front and back and inside, before it becomes the final book. 

My costs also include not only website designing and the marketing of the book, but the fees for the supportive Indiegiegogo funding program itself.


Book Title:  A Priestess Remembers: Secret Tablets, Ancient Temple

This memoir is about a period in my life when I  remembered an ancient treasure, hidden over a thousand years ago, near a famous village in southern France, that was stored there for all of humanity.

Letting go of everything in the outer world, I moved to Sedona, Arizona, where my story begins, opening up to understand parts of myself, I’d not known before. After life shattering situations and elusive beings appearing to me, I was called to awaken to my deeper feminine self. Furthermore, I began to explore legacies and wisdom teachings that stretched back to the ancient goddess and priestess cultures from long ago.  

I began facilitating journeys and pilgrimages to southern France to explore the Magdalene legacies present there, when visions and dreams of ancient priestess temples and intergalactic beings traveling there, started being revealed to me. These visions included something hidden there long ago, left near the famous village of Rennes Le Chateau. This tiny village had gained worldwide attention after the book “Holy Blood, Holy Grail”, came out in 1982. 

Memory flashes of a 12th century Knights Templar guarding something deep in the earth, brought me closer to remembering this treasure. Waiting for the right time to be revealed….that time is now and it is why I’ve written this book. 

Although there have been countless stories of treasure and legacies left by Mary Magdalene, the Knights Templar and the Cathars in this region, which thousands of people have come to explore for themselves, the information I have received, is vital and has not been recorded or expressed before in a book, to the best of my knowledge.

Any of you who wish to contribute and help with its publication, I am grateful.

Nancy's Biography

Nancy Safford has been a photojournalist, author and a pioneer in bringing holography - the three dimensional image - successfully into education as an interdisciplinary approach, in New York State. She is a shamanic practitioner, a visionary and intuitive  counselor, an ordained Priestess, facilitating women's groups and processes for nearly twenty years. As a bilingual guide Nancy has facilitated journeys and pilgrimages to sacred sites in southern France since 1996, and is a researcher of the legacies and mysteries of Mary Magdalene, the Knights Templar and Cathars since that time. Nancy is also a professional guide in Sedona, Arizona assisting visitors who come to experience and understand the mysterious vortices, famous on the land there. She lives in Sedona, Arizona, but part time in the Rennes Le Chateau area of southern France.

To Publish My BookYour support will help me begin the publishing process for my book.The cost includes the editor, (big cost), copy editor who works with the final style and book details, including grammar, words and corrections, before the proof reader does the last overview. Finally it arrives to be formatted, the process which involves everything about the creation of the physical book design, both the inner and outer, including the cover, spine and back cover, which includes all the writing details on both the front and back and inside, before it becomes the final book. My costs also include not only website designing and the marketing of the book, but the fees for the supportive Indiegiegogo funding program itself.Book Title:  A Priestess Remembers: Secret Tablets, Ancient TempleThis memoir is about a period in my life when I  remembered an ancient treasure, hidden over a thousand years ago, near a famous village in southern France, that was stored there for all of humanity.Letting go of everything in the outer world, I moved to Sedona, Arizona, where my story begins, opening up to understand parts of myself, I’d not known before. After life shattering situations and elusive beings appearing to me, I was called to awaken to my deeper feminine self. Furthermore, I began to explore legacies and wisdom teachings that stretched back to the ancient goddess and priestess cultures from long ago.  I began facilitating journeys and pilgrimages to southern France to explore the Magdalene legacies present there, when visions and dreams of ancient priestess temples and intergalactic beings traveling there, started being revealed to me. These visions included something hidden there long ago, left near the famous village of Rennes Le Chateau. This tiny village had gained worldwide attention after the book “Holy Blood, Holy Grail”, came out in 1982. Memory flashes of a 12th century Knights Templar guarding something deep in the earth, brought me closer to remembering this treasure. Waiting for the right time to be revealed….that time is now and it is why I’ve written this book. Although there have been countless stories of treasure and legacies left by Mary Magdalene, the Knights Templar and the Cathars in this region, which thousands of people have come to explore for themselves, the information I have received, is vital and has not been recorded or expressed before in a book, to the best of my knowledge.
Any of you who wish to contribute and help with its publication, I am grateful.
Nancy's Biography
Nancy Safford has been a photojournalist, author and a pioneer in bringing holography - the three dimensional image - successfully into education as an interdisciplinary approach, in New York State. She is a shamanic practitioner, a visionary and intuitive  counselor, an ordained Priestess, facilitating women's groups and processes for nearly twenty years. As a bilingual guide Nancy has facilitated journeys and pilgrimages to sacred sites in southern France since 1996, and is a researcher of the legacies and mysteries of Mary Magdalene, the Knights Templar and Cathars since that time. Nancy is also a professional guide in Sedona, Arizona assisting visitors who come to experience and understand the mysterious vortices, famous on the land there. She lives in Sedona, Arizona, but part time in the Rennes Le Chateau area of southern France.

story:
¿Qué?

¿Olvidarás mi nombre? es una novela llena de amor, de esperanza cuando ya se cree que no puede haberla, que nos recuerda que la única batalla perdida es aquella que no se lucha.

¿Olvidarás mi nombre? es un viaje de la memoria. Narra la vida de Candelaria a través de los recuerdos de su marido. Se añorarán los momentos más felices que compartieron: el día que se conocieron, el primer beso, el cariño a sus hijos... Pero también se hablará de la aparición de una enfermedad que somete a la protagonista a las tinieblas del olvido y a continuar viviendo sin sentirse viva.

La historia pone en relieve la importancia de los recuerdos y el sufrimiento que provoca el olvido. Desde la vejez y a través de la memoria, el narrador regresa a su juventud y recuerda con cariño la vida que compartieron, pero también con dolor porque quizá Candelaria la olvidó.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Gabino S. Llamazares.

Pacense de treinta y cuatro años, natural de Fuente del Maestre, se licenció en Administración y Dirección de Empresas por la Universidad de Extremadura en 2004. Dos años más tarde, presentó su tesina sobre la Responsabilidad Social Corporativa, siendo calificada con Matrícula de Honor. Tan solo un año después, se incorporó a su actual empresa, donde ejerce como director de oficina en una entidad financiera; desde hace unos años reside en Zafra. En este momento, participa como voluntario en los comités extremeños de Oxfam Intermon, como portavoz, y Amnistía Internacional, como tesorero.

En cuanto al mundo de las letras, cabe destacar que ha sido incluido en un par de poemarios y la obtención de un premio nacional de Artículos sobre Contabilidad y Administración de Empresas y del Sector Público.

Gabino S. Llamazares rebosa creatividad y sentimiento...

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 850€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de ¿Olvidarás mi nombre? que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Gabino S. Llamazares vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
About this project...

Hey Everyone! 

I know it looks like the book already exists but the company who designed the cover sent me this mock-up photo, as part of their package for their cover design : )  

So far so good with the cover, the professionally edited story and the blurb but there's still a little way to go. Still on the to-do list are: the back cover, the spine and the interior design and formatting. As well as the printing and the all-important marketing. 

Please will you help me complete this project? 

In case you're wondering, here is the blurb for the book: 

Australia is ruled by the SIF.

The Special Investigation Force controls everything. Water, food, fuel … women’s bodies. 

18-year-old Ora has never questioned their authority; everyone knows it’s all for the ‘safety of the nation’.

But Ora’s decision to move in with her aunt is a bad one. She’s just landed herself in the middle of nowhere with a deluded activist who wants to change the world, one illegal birth at a time. Sooner or later someone is going to die and Ora doesn’t know where to turn.

The beach is her only sanctuary and it’s here that she meets Jake, thoughtful and experienced, who encourages her to live a little. So why is it that as soon as she starts to have some fun, everything goes dangerously wrong?

A gripping coming-of-age adventure that will leave you on the edge of your seat.   

The story, as well as being a real page-turner, raises questions about body sovereignty and women's rights. These are issues that need to be talked about, thought about and acted upon. ORA'S GOLD grew out of a rich and potent compost: Australia's current birthing culture; the three births of my own children; hours spent sourcing and editing countless birth stories for magazines and my training and experience as a doula/birth attendant.

Ora herself entered stage left at the end of a phenomenal flu back in November, 2011. After the fever had broken, I sat up, grabbed my laptop and wrote the key scene where Ora is a very reluctant player in a highly charged and dangerous situation. The rest of the book sprang up around this scene, sometimes randomly, sometimes organically. I didn't have the plot mapped out from the beginning and I wasn't always happy about what happened. In fact, I was rather distraught somewhere near the middle of the book. At the time though, I didn't know it was the middle of the book and I didn't know the ending either. As you may imagine, the structuring was a nightmare but with the help of time (years!) a talented editor and many re-writes, I finally ironed out all of the issues. 

  • My dream is to produce a beautifully designed book and push it out into the world as far and wide as a canny marketing strategy will take me. 
  • A successful marketing campaign will mean the difference between a few hundred readers and many thousands. But first, I need a well-designed product.

Here are a few more details:

  • $3000 will pay for: 
  1. The completion of the design - the back cover, the spine and the interior layout and formatting ($1200)
  2. Printing and good paper quality ($800)
  3. Marketing ($1000. If anything more than this is raised, it will go towards a bigger and better marketing campaign) 
  4. Commission to Indiegogo and Paypal ($240)
  • The Perks - the book!! Either digital or paperback or both.
  • If I don't reach the entire goal, I will still design and print the book and the marketing will depend completely on me which I will give my best shot. Either way, I'll still be doing most of the marketing.
  

The Impact

  • With your help, this book will be read by thousands of people, particularly younger folk. As well as it being an entertaining read, it will expose them to births other than the standard ones you see depicted in modern day culture where the woman is usually on her back and powerless. I also hope it will encourage discussion about women's informed choice.

Risks & Challenges

  • This is a low-risk project. I'm almost through the gates. Today, I sent the manuscript off to the graphic designer for the design and layout/formatting. Once that's done the back cover and spine will be designed. So if you donate, you will definitely receive a book, even if I don't reach the entire goal. The paper quality and the reach of the marketing campaign will be the things that are compromised. 
  • This will be my third foray into self-publishing. My non-fiction book for breastfeeding mothers is still selling well and has proven to be very useful to many. Barefoot magazine ran for three years and was read and enjoyed by thousands. I have industry experience, so I will use the funds well : )

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't or don't feel you want to donate, please will you consider: 

  • Getting the word out and making some noise about this campaign.
  • Using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you SO MUCH!!!

story:
About The Author

Jennifer Ayana Harrison is the Owner of Ayana Wellness Spa and Educational Resources, in Baltimore Maryland.  She has been interested and involved in healthy lifestyle changes, natural healing and metaphysics for over 4 decades.  As a Wellness Coach and Spiritual Advisor, she promotes “Self Care” as a lasting approach to creating a better quality of life and living.

Cover of "Awakening Conversations With Self"

Ayana currently preparing her first book “Awakening Conversations With Self” Become all of who you really are.

This book is a collection of contemplative thoughts by Jennifer Ayana Harrison; Owner of Ayana Wellness Spa, Wellness Coach and Spiritual Advisor.  Ayana has over 40 years of experience as a lifestyle changer, entrepreneur and motivator.  This book will arouse your interest in many ways; you will feel her message getting through to you, it will touch home with your feeling and cause you to re-think, re-evaluate where you are in your life, even the pictures tell a story and are stimulating.  Uplifting, inspiring and designed to encourage you to re- read and contemplate your own thoughts about yourself. Relaxing and an enjoyable read.  

Inside spread of "Awakening Conversations With Self"

What We Need & What You Get

It is her hope and desire that you will gain insight and inspiration from what were for healing moments of reflection. These conversations provides an opportunity for her to search deep within to discover her True Self, her true nature and identity with her God Self.  Funding will allow us to take the book to press. We have several "Wellness Perks" available for your contributions. Together we can put you back on a path of wellness.

"Affirmations and Meditation" CD

Risks & Challenges

My team has been working diligently on design and content. We are currently in final stages of preparing the book to be printed. Risks and challenges have been taken into consideration with the pre-production of this book. We will however be challenged with distribution. We will face this challenge with online and social networking promotion.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you simply just can't contribute at this time, here's how you can help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Positive is an international forum platform founded in 2007 by Giacomo Cosua.

“My idea was to create an online space where people can find great pieces of journalism, amazing photos and projects, all aimed at embodying one fundamental element: quality”.

Our goal was to create an arena that allows different viewpoints around the world to be presented comprehensively.

From 2007 until today, we have been focusing on few but important keywords:

1) Creativity
2) Independence
3) Quality

WHAT WE HAVE WORKED ON SO FAR

We first launched Positive as a PDF-formatted Magazine whose contents were entirely free for anyone to download, and we have in fact been keeping them free for everyone ever since.

In 2008 we started the website www.positive-magazine.com, and in 2013 we decided to expand our content offers by creating 2 new platforms:

One in Italian (www.italy.positive-magazine.com), and the other is set in one of the most intriguing megalopolises in Europe: Berlin (www.berlin.positive-magazine.com).

Until today, 14 issues have been released online, which contain thousands of pages featuring interviews, photographs, critical reviews and overviews on various projects from all over the world.

WHAT WE PRESENT:

Photography: You can find interviews with established young photographers, reviews and presentations of innovative and unreleased projects, plus one or more focuses on new trends.

Reportage: Initially set up as an ad-hoc project, these pieces talk about various international topics both chosen by the editorial staff and suggested by the contributors’ network of POSI+TIVE.

Art: Reviews and interviews with emerging artists together with particular attention to Italian and overseas events.

Design&Architecture: Interviews and reviews concerning emerging and established designers and architects.

Fashion: Realization of interviews, reviews and editorials dedicated to Italian and foreign fashion and emerging stylists, with a special focus on the Made-in-Italy.

Street Culture: Here the readers can find a showcase with the latest trends and cultural models concerning new medias, music and sports.

FACTS:

1) We distributed more than 2.000 articles online on our 3 websites from 2007 onwards.

2) On Issuu, one of the most important platforms for online magazines, we have gained almost 1.900.000 views on our 14 editions.

3) We covered significant affairs all around the world:

a. The Arab spring for instance, documenting the revolution which took place in Egypt day by day.

b. Cultural events, such as the Venice Film Festival, The Venice Art & Architecture Biennale, the G20 in Canada, the international design week in Milan and many others.

c. The Fashion weeks all around the world, ranging from Milan, Paris, Berlin to London, showing the backstage scenes and the shows of the most noteworthy and emerging brands.

4) Social Media activity: With more than 24.000 likes on Facebook, we keep our followers updated everyday with new articles and all the other contents we have been creating.

WHAT’S NEXT?

As we like to constantly challenge ourselves with new adventures, we are ready to create something different in combination with all the other contents that we have been producing in these 8 years.

Positive Magazine goes on print!

We are ready to print our first paper issue which will be distributed and sold around Europe, New York City and Australia, thanks to our international distributor EXPORT PRESS present among the best bookshops and newsagents.

We will present the magazine in Venice for the Opening of the Art Biennale 2015, thanks to the international crowd and the amazing upcoming exposure.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We have a magazine ready to be printed with original stories from all over the world, fashion editorials, interviews with both prominent and emerging actors, musicians, photographers, architects and so forth.

What we need now is your contribution.

To cover the costs of printing and shipping of our first issue (and paying our talented crop of local freelancers and all-volunteer team) we will need to raise at least €6,500.

Our first print issue will be released in May and it will be distributed in Europe, New York City and Australia, and also sold on our website.


OTHER WAYS IN WHICH YOU CAN HELP

Even if you are unable to contribute, we would still like to ask for your support in order to help us make our dream come true!

Spreading your voice to your friends is vital for us! We need to involve a lot of people in our project everyday to reach our goal of €6.500.

Share this campaign trough your social media platforms, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, Pinterest or any other platform of your preference. We appreciate your help immensely!

Help Positive Magazine get printed with its outstandingly powerful stories!


A SPECIAL THANKS
To thank you for your help to develop the project, you’ll get your name published in the official special thanks page of the online magazine.

SUPPORTERS #1
To thank you for your support, your name will be published in the “Supporter special section" on the first number of the paper magazine distributed worldwide from May 2015, and we will send you a special postcard of the magazine.

A COPY OF THE MAGAZINE
To thank you for your support, you'll get the first issue of Positive+Magazine right to your front door, and your name will be published in the official special thanks page on the website.

1 YEAR SUBCRIPTION + THANKS
You will get 1 year subscription of the magazine (2 issues) in front of your door + your name on our special thanks page inside the magazine.

1 YEAR SUBSCRIPTION + SPECIAL
You will get 1 year subscription of the magazine (2 issues) in front of your door + your name on our special thanks page inside the magazine, and 2 postcards of the magazine.

ONE LIMITED EDITION PHOTO
To thank you we will send you an original picture, 20x30 cm that you can choose between a selection of 11 images (that you can find here on the gallery) shot by Giacomo Cosua.
Your name will be published in the official special thanks page on the website.
Also you will get a copy of the magazine.

SPECIAL PACKAGE SUPPORT
To thank you, we will send you an original picture, 20x30 cm that you can choose between a selection of 11 images (that you can find here on the gallery) shot by Giacomo Cosua. You will get 2 postcards and one poster of the magazine.
Your name will be published in the official special thanks page on the website.
Also you will get a copy of the magazine.

WORKSHOP REPORTAGE
A full-day photo workshop with Giacomo Cosua editor and photographer at the Venice Film Festival in September 2015  (minimum 5 participants)
(Travel expenses, meals and accommodation are not included. We will help you to find low budget and nice accommodation in Venice)
A copy of the first issue of the magazine + your name on the official supporter page on the first issue. We will publish the photos you took at the workshop on Positive Magazine website.

story:
Story of My Book

My name is Devyn Bakewell and I am the author of "Greater Love". I decided to write this book because young black voices need to be heard more often and need to be better represented in literature. We should be able to find books that speak of our life experiences, what we go through, and how we carry on throughout life. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the struggles of self-discovery, finding love, and navigating as a black young adult in America. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with HBCU/college life, young adult love, black love, as well as start a discussion of navigating a racist America as a young black person, especially in today’s society. 

Ryan McKnight left for New York with a plan to leave her hometown, family, and friends completely behind her. With the excitement of going to college and moving across the country for the first time, the goal is to dive head first into her school, work, and her dreams and excel. She wants new friends to become family, new opportunities, and just a new life in general. However, she quickly finds out that isn’t as easy to leave the past behind as she thinks even when traveling over a thousand miles to escape it. When Ryan reconnects with Devyn Baker, a popular jock from her old high school, she wants nothing to do with him and makes it obvious. But fate has a way of continuously putting him in her path. Will she be able to get rid of him and continue on with her new life? Or will her past keep getting in the way?

Message for All: 

You will love this book if you’re a young woman, a black woman, or just a person trying to get a first-hand view of what college is. You will enjoy this book if you’re looking for a good escape and a beautiful romance, and you will enjoy this book if you want to read a story about a girl who is imperfect and finding her way. 

"Greater Love" speaks to adults and young adults who want to grapple with college life and black love in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that "Greater Love" inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • How can one’s view of us benefit the way we see ourselves? What can one do to start new journeys in becoming their best self? How does love benefit ones life and what purpose does it bring to one’s life? 
  • How can communities make sure all of their members are seen, heard, and taken care of? Why do black communities hide it’s faults and let negative/cruel parties continue to damage the lives of it’s members overtime (situations in regard to sexual assault of minors, drug use, etc.)? What are the primary issues in society (black or otherwise) that are often swept under the rug but need to be dealt with? Why does a complicated relationship between police and black people still stand today? Can this relationship be improved, and if not why? 
  • Why is college such an important time of self-discovery? Do stereotypes stand in college, and are they necessary in this liberal millennial age? Is young love real? Why is sexual assault so prominent in college and on college campuses? is there one way to heal from sexual assault? 

 

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing race, your adult life, college life, young love, and sexual assault will change us all for the better. 

The Book

The book is divided into Four Parts: 

  • Part 1 contains the prologue + Chapters 1 through 6. Readers will be introduced to Ryan and Devyn, and get to know the two well. Ryan will introduce her struggles in Garden Heights, Los Angeles (her hometown) and why she needed to escape her father and his business partner Ivan. Ryan meets new friends and finds two new jobs. They will also get an inkling of the building relationship between Devyn and Ryan. 

 

  • Part 2 contains Chapters 7 through 12. Readers learn the full detriments of Ryan’s past with Ivan. They will learn the secondary struggles of navigating through college life in a budding relationship, and see Ryan’s anxiety after Ivan comes to get her from the school. 

 

  • Part 3 contains Chapters 13 through 18. Events happen that lead Devyn and Ryan to rush to Los Angeles to take care of his family and close friends. Ryan is afraid of running into Ivan and her father, and runs into her father. Ryan and Devyn struggle to find the answers to their questions. 
  • Part 4 contains Chapters 19 to 22. A situation between Devyn and Ivan leads Ryan to fight for her life. Devyn struggles to find her. 

 

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020 
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About The Author 

Devyn Bakewell is a graduating senior from Howard University from Los Angeles, California. 

She wrote this book because she believes that black people need to be better represented in literary canons. We deserve to give first-hand accounts of our stories and to read about them. Black life and love also is something that needs to be discussed more and celebrated in literature. 

Her passion is that all black people, young and old, find a way to share their stories and ideas with the world, and to use the black community as a source of community and encouragement. She believes that if we all come together as one in love and support, the bounds of this life are endless.

For more information you can connect with Devyn Bakewell at Devyn.bakewell@gmail.com or on all social media platforms @dgirl2221 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, there’s still ways to help! 

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #GreaterLove and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Best,
Devyn Bakewell

story:
Some Background

The New Sh!t Show is an all new, all poetry reading series based in San Francisco. For years we have been dedicated to providing a space for the production of new work within the Bay Area literary/spoken word community, and the show now runs in four cities across the country.

This year, the New Shit Show is sending a team to the National Poetry Slam where we will try to continue our mission by competing only with new work. The New Shit Team is: Jason Bayani, Tatyana Brown, Jelal Huyler, Joshua Merchant, and Danez Smith! So, not only are we going to NPS with all new work, but also with a powerhouse team. But we need your help!



What We Need & What You Get

  • We're lucky this year that we only have to travel across the Bay to the National Poetry Slam in Oakland this year. However, because NSS has always been about giving to the community & not making a profit, we need some help covering the cost of registration, hotel room, food, taking off from work, etc.

  • In return for your help, we have some fabulous perks for you. In addition to a team chapbook (also available for purchase here), we also have bundles of individual books from team members + a variety of fun, personalized services. 

  • We are also having fundraisers around the Bay, so even if we don't raise all of our funds, any money we do raise will go to the New Shit Team's trip to NPS.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, we'd really appreciate it if you could spread the word on facebook, twitter, etc. Also, keep up with the New Shit Show on Facebook or Wordpress! In addition to the regular show, the team will be doing shows all over the Bay Area this summer, we'd love to see you there!

story:
Photo Jakob Ellingson

- English follows -

Qui suis-je?
Je m'appelle Guillaume Bertrand. Je suis natif d'un petit village de la Mauricie appelé Saint-Barnabé!

Que fais-je?
Du biathlon! Non, pas de la nage et de la course... ni du vélo. Pas de tir à l'arc non plus!  Du ski de fond et du tir à la carabine. Un bon alliage entre les habiletés physiques d'un skieur, et la précision du tireur!

Mais qu'essé tu veux?
En fait, je viens d'avoir la bonne nouvelle que je vais représenter le Canada à la Coupe IBU #5 à Langdorf en Allemagne et aux Championnats européens à Otepää en Estonie! Je pars le 11 janvier et je reviens le 4 février!

Ouin... Pis?
Eh bien voyager en Europe, ce n'est pas donné! Je dois défrayer tous les frais associés à la tournée. Je paye donc les déplacements, l'hébergement, les repas, l'habillement, les frais d'inscription, les entraîneurs et autres. Le coût du voyage est estimé à 4000 $. C'est sans compter les frais d'entraînement qui m'ont permis de me rendre jusque-là comme les frais d'équipe à Canmore et au Québec, le logement et les coûts de la vie à Canmore, les camps d'entraînement, l'équipement de course, l'équipement d'entraînement et bien d'autres. Le total s'élève à plus de 20 000 $ pour la saison.

Ok... Mais comment on peut t'aider?
C'est bien simple! Pour m'aider, vous pouvez me faire un don. J'ai plusieurs prix et cadeaux à remettre à ceux qui veulent contribuer! Le cadeau varie selon le montant du don! Vous pourriez même GAGNER une PAIRE DE SKIS! Chaque don fait son bout de chemin.

L'autre manière est de partager mon projet avec vos amis. Plus on est de fous plus on rit! Suivez ma page Facebook Guillaume Bertrand ou mon site internet guillaumebertrand.weebly.com et restez attentifs aux prochaines aventures! Faites partie du voyage, une étape de franchie vers mon rêve Olympique!

Merci pour votre support!

Photo Jakob Ellingson

** Informations supplémentaires

Combo randonnée : L'activité peut avoir lieu en skis sur la neige ou en skis à roulettes l'été, selon nos disponibilités. Je me déplacerait dans une limite de 100 km pour faire l'activité. Je vous ferai essayer le tir dans un champ de tir accrédité seulement donc certaines régions n'ont pas de champ de tir réglementaire. La carabine sera fournie, tout comme l'équipement de ski qui sera disponible dans des grandeurs limitées.

Pour les compagnies : Vous trouverez ci-bas le plan de visibilité. N'hésitez pas à me contacter via mon courriel frizzbertrand54@hotmail.com pour plus d'informations. Nous pourrons discuter d'une solution sur mesure  pour votre entreprise. J'ai plusieurs autres outils de promotions que nous pourrions mettre à profit.


The Biathlon IBU Cup On Sight


Who are you?

My name is Guillaume Bertrand. I was born in a small town called Saint-Barnabé, Québec.

What are you doing?

Biathlon! No, I don’t swim and run… and there is no biking involved. And I don’t use a bow to shoot my targets either. I cross-country ski and I shoot a rifle. It’s the best combination between the skier’s physical abilities and the precision of the marksman.

What do you want?!?

Actually, I just had the good news that I will represent Canada at the IBU Cup #5 in Langdorf, Germany, and at the European Championships in Otepää, Estonia. I am leaving on January 11th and coming back on February 4th.

Yeah Yeah! So what?

Well traveling to Europe is pretty expensive! I have to pay all the tour fees by myself. So, I need to pay for flights, transport, hotel, food, coaches’ fees, registration, clothing and more. The total will be around $4000. That is in addition to the training fees like housing and living in Canmore, club and team fees both in Canmore and Québec, training camps, training and racing equipment and much more that bring my expenses up to over $20 000.

Okay. But how can we help you?

It’s pretty simple! You can contribute with a donation. I have many interesting gifts and prizes for the contributors. You can find the gifts in the giveback section. The gift depends on the contribution. You can even WIN A PAIR OF SKIS! Every donation counts.

Another way to contribute is to share my project with your friends. The more people with us the better chance of success! Then, follow my Facebook page Guillaume Bertrand or my website guillaumebertrand.weebly.com and stay alert for more updates! Be part of my trip, a step in my journey to the Olympics!

Thanks for your support!

Photo Lowell Niven

** Additionnal information

Combo randonnée : The activity can be done on snow or on rollerskis in the summer, depending on our availability. I will travel up to 100 km maximum to do the activity. I will also make you shoot on an accreditated range only. Many regions don't have a functionnal range. I will supply the rifle and ski equipment in limited sizes.

For compagnies: You'll find lower my visibility plan. Don't hesitate to contact me via e-mail : frizzbertrand54@hotmail.com for more information. We can discuss a solution that fits the needs of your compagny. I also have other promotion tools we can discuss about.

Suivez ma page Facebook Guillaume Bertrand ou mon site internet guillaumebertrand.weebly.com et restez attentifs aux prochaines aventures! Faites partie du voyage, une étape de franchie vers mon rêve Olympique! Merci pour votre support! Je me déplacerait dans une limite de 100 km pour faire l'activité. Je vous ferai essayer le tir dans un champ de tir accrédité seulement donc certaines régions n'ont pas de champ de tir réglementaire. La carabine sera fournie, tout comme l'équipement de ski qui sera disponible dans des grandeurs limitées.Pour les compagnies : Vous trouverez ci-bas le plan de visibilité. N'hésitez pas à me contacter via mon courriel frizzbertrand54@hotmail.com pour plus d'informations. Nous pourrons discuter d'une solution sur mesure  pour votre entreprise. J'ai plusieurs autres outils de promotions que nous pourrions mettre à profit. The Biathlon IBU Cup On Sight
Who are you? 
My name is Guillaume Bertrand. I was born in a small town called
Saint-Barnabé, Québec.
What are you doing? 
Biathlon! No, I don’t swim and run… and there is no biking involved. And
I don’t use a bow to shoot my targets either. I cross-country ski and I shoot
a rifle. It’s the best combination between the skier’s physical abilities and the
precision of the marksman. 
What do you want?!? 
Actually, I just had the good news that I will represent Canada at the
IBU Cup #5 in Langdorf, Germany, and at the European Championships in Otepää,
Estonia. I am leaving on January 11th and coming back on February 4th.

Yeah Yeah! So what? 
Well traveling to Europe is pretty expensive! I have to pay all the tour
fees by myself. So, I need to pay for flights, transport, hotel, food, coaches’
fees, registration, clothing and more. The total will be around $4000. That is in addition to the training fees like housing and living in Canmore, club and team fees both in Canmore and Québec, training camps, training and racing equipment and much more that bring my expenses up to over $20 000.
Okay. But how can we help
you?
It’s pretty simple! You can contribute with a donation. I have many
interesting gifts and prizes for the contributors. You can find the gifts in the giveback section. The gift
depends on the contribution. You can even WIN A PAIR OF SKIS! Every donation counts. 

Another way to contribute is to share my project
with your friends. The more people with us the better chance of success! Then,
follow my Facebook page Guillaume Bertrand or my website guillaumebertrand.weebly.com and stay alert for more updates! Be
part of my trip, a step in my journey to the Olympics! Thanks for your support! story:
Unapologetically Insane Tales - The stories' story.

Hey there,

Thanks for dropping by. I'm Zed, librarian and storycrafter. 6 years back, I was on a jetplane to Amsterdam. I had a pen and a notebook, and I wrote the beginning of a story. It was about a boy with a peculiar condition. He had tendrils growing out from his eyes and could see things that no one else could: Flying cows, talking snails and glowing mushrooms. He was a strange kid indeed.

So was I. At 14, I decided that I liked philosophy, and a decade later, while many of my peers have gotten business and econs degrees, I graduated with a degree in philosophy. The philosophical mind is a fertile ground for imagination, and I did have this crazy head of ideas and narratives. I felt I had to put these stories down somewhere, because stories are creatures that die if you do not put them in prose. It's like fish and water. You put a fish in water or it dies. You put a story on paper or it dies.

Like that, I went on a mission to save stories and I wrote and wrote. So six years on, twenty of them are gathered here, in a 120 page book, finally ready to breathe. I hope you give them a chance. I feel like the father of these orphan stories. ('Contradiction, aha!' you say. I know, but it make sense in a nonsensical way!) They might not look like the clean cut boys born of polished pens, but they are good children. If you give them a chance, they would dance for you.

Please support Unapologetically Insane Tales.

 

Maths - Everyone's favourite subject.

You might want to know how the math works out.
Note: Perks and contributions are made in USD, as are the calculations that follow.

Printing cost: About 1500
Editing/Illustrations/Layout: About 1400
Paypal/Indiegogo/Currencey Conversion: 10% of amount raised.
Time invested: 6 years

If author raises $4,500, he earns $192 per year.

 

What's after this?

I'm dead serious about stories. Having this campaign succeed grants me more credentials so that publishers and distributors (bookstores) know I'm serious. The upstart author always has a problem of telling everyone the stellar record they have - unpublished wth zero sales. I'm dead serious, but if I don't get support, I remain merely dead.

Please kickstart my career. With enough kicks, even the dead will rise.

  • Some authors are 1-book authors. Meaning they end at one book. I have more than one book. I want to write many many more.
  • I want to write many many more. Oh... I said that already?
  • But that's a fact and that is why I take this so seriously and why this campaign must succeeed.

 

Ways You Can Support

  • If you like this well enough, you can get a copy or a perk!
  • Get the word out and make some noise about Unapologetically Insane Tales
  • Try using the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

 

PS: If you need a preview, check out the "Updates" tab. I've put up a few excerpts for you ;)

story:
Having reached my 80s, I have been blessed with the great fortune of experiencing what seems like a limitless amount of extraordinary memories in my life, and it is with great passion and desire that I want to share these stories with you. In 2014, I embarked on an amazing adventure of creating audio podcasts to tell these stories and document my life's memoirs, and I can honestly say that it has been one of the most thrilling things I've ever done. Reliving the people, the places, the emotions and all of the moments in my life, and presenting them to the outside world, has and continues to offer me new perspectives that I never was able to see before.  You can currently listen to them at http://www.michaelbutler.com/podcast/memoirs/and you can watch videos at https://www.youtube.com/user/michaelbutlermemoirs.

I have assembled a wonderful team of people to guide me through this journey. Without them, none of this would be possible. To date, I have produced 26 podcast episodes, and it is my goal to produce at least another 30-40, but I need your help to continue moving forward.

To date, we have been able to increase our overall audience by nearly 250% with an average monthly increase of 35%.  Bootstrapping our way through to where we are today has proven to be viable, but now we are ready to take it to the next level.

My goal is to raise enough funding support to allow me the ability to record 10 more podcasts at a time. 

Phase 1 begins now. This will include podcasts from Polo to HAIR. If we do well, we will enter into Phase 2, and hopefully a Phase 3!

With your contribution, I will be able to complete my life's memoirs for all to enjoy. Thank you for encouragement and support!

Peace and Love

Michael

***************************

I have compiled a list of themes that I have covered as well as those that are yet to be recorded.

COMPLETED PODCAST THEMES

• Mexican Polo Player Carlos Gracida

• The Kennedys - Jack, Bobby and Ted


• Family and Childhood

• My Time In Acapulco

• US Equestrian Trials

• My Travels Through Africa


UNCOMPLETED PODCAST THEMES

• Polo - the politics, the sport, the management…and The Royals!

• Sports - Horse, Youth, Adult

• Sailing On My Boat

• Businesses - Family, Discotheques and more

• Broadway and New York

• Hollywood, Audrey Hepburn, Candice Bergen, Rock Hudson, Mick Jagger and more

• HAiR the Musical - from the politics to art to the business and to my emotional experience


• My Time in The Middle East with Kings and Shahs

• My Travels Through South America

• Religion - from my godfather Tyrone Power to Catholicism and from Popes to Yogis

• Homes - Oakbrook, NYC, Overseas, California

WHY I NEED YOU

I could really use your help!  Documenting my life, creating podcasts and promoting them may seem like an easy task, but trust me, now that I've been doing this for a while, I know that it's quite the opposite.

After countless meetings of discussing what topics to cover, researching these topics in depth, scanning, cataloging and uploading all of my photos, hours of me sitting at my computer fumbling away with GarageBand and a microphone that just doesn't want to work the way I need it to, audio editors picking out the best parts and editing the podcasts together, video editors compiling photos and cutting together visual versions of the podcasts, mailings to my subscriber lists, social media teams spreading the word across the Internet, and just the overall time and money it takes for all of this…whew! I'm exhausted even talking about it!  In order to keep all of that going, I need to raise more money so that I can continue on this exciting roller coaster that has only just begun.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU…PERKS!

My team and I have created a fun list of PERKS as a thank you for your donation. Please take a look at them and see what tickles your fancy!  If you have any questions, you can always email my team at: info@michaelbutler.com.  Here are a few examples of the fun perks!

HAiR BEADS $50

AFRICAN HANDMADE CANES $400

AUTOGRAPHED POPE JOAN SCRIPT $200

HAIR VIP TICKETS RAFFLE $10


Thanks so much!   You are amazing and we are so happy to have you on board!
If you are unable to donate, but would still like to help, please share this by email, social media or word of mouth to all of your friends and families.

story:
Why am I using this to help me publish?

My name is Bill Speakman. If you know my name, it's because you're already familiar with me, my photography or my writing. If you don't know my name, it's because I am a very humble person who always feels like nothing is ever good enough. It's time to change that. Photography is where I fell in love with the visual part of life, and writing is where I get to fill in all of the blank spaces that I see. It took a great amount of courage to even post any of my writing online, let alone take on a project like this. You can find a decent sampling of my writing on instagram (@bill_speakman). To publish a small chapbook of my poetry (roughly 35-50 pages) is something I have wanted to do for a while. I also want to show different sides of me and my writing that aren't always instagram friendly (aka too lengthy, too in depth etc. not offensive or anything.). This is my chance. I want this to be a positive experience for me and anyone who reads this.

However, this is also a way for me to give back to the people who have supported me, and also a chance to give to charity. I will donate 5% of any money raised to TWLOHA (To Write Love On Her Arms). If I reach the goal I set, I will double it to 10%, since I will have to pay less to fund this. (unfortunately the lowest goal you can set is 500, which is double what I wanted to set it at. So, it will take some work to hit this goal. I promise I will make it worth it if it happens though.)


What will be in this chapbook?

This will be a collection of both my poetry/prose and a small section dedicated to haiku. It is a work in progress, and that is why I am unsure of the page count. Will everything in the book have been posted to instagram at one point? No. There will be pieces in here that have never been seen by anyone before. Some of them will be ones I have already posted to social media. The unseen material will far outweigh what has already been shown. (below is my instagram - feel free to follow me there @bill_speakman. links to my other social media accounts are on there as well.)


Why donate?

I am doing this by myself. Will I still publish the book if no one supports this? Yes. It will come out of my own pocket. But by doing this, I am hoping that I can give out some perks that will really interest people (and if you have any more, suggest them!). Also, I can donate to charity as well. 5 or 10 percent may not seem like much, but every little bit helps. 

This gives me a chance to give anyone who supports me something more than just a book, also. I love getting hand typed pieces of my work into peoples hands. There is no better feeling than knowing that something I wrote moves someone else.

How will your donation be used?

Basically, your donation is just a preorder for my chapbook, plus whatever else comes with the perk you choose. Like I said, I am doing this by myself. Front cover, back cover, editing... you name it, I'm doing it. This is a big deal to me, the ability to have complete creative control over what goes into this. I want it to be something I am proud of. 

I hope that the perks will be enough to spark some interest as well. I'm excited about some of them and hopefully you are too.

Want to help out without donating?

Simply sharing this with someone who may be interested is a huge deal to me, and I thank you in advance. 

Thank you for your support,
Bill Speakman

story:
Hi Kids!

I'm Felix Clay and I write for Cracked.com. Perhaps you've chuckled at my hilarious quips in the past. I hope so. Let's be pals!

Turns out when I went to college, I was supposed to pay. Oh my god, right? Who knew? Well, it's been a few years and it looks like the people who loaned me all that money want it back now.

Of course, if I were a smarter man I would have fixed this issue myself a long time ago, but I'm not a smarter man and I don't have a time machine so I have to deal with this today lest I be sent to modern debtor's prison. Do they have those? If not, I'll probably just have some guys in suits break my knees.

Basically I need to pay off a whopping $25,000 debt so that I can keep being cool and keep being me. But fear not, I'm not just expecting you to pick me up because I fell down, I'm not a 100% freeloader. Instead, I want you to help me do what I always do and this time you're the beneficiary. You help me and i'll write for you. I got perks, y'all!

As you'll see, I'm trying to do what I do best (or at least moderately well) on your behalf.  Help me and I'll create for you.  As for when, it'll be as soon as possible.  But if 25,000 people donate $1 each, it may be a while for me to write 25,000 100 word short stories.  But don't doubt that I will absolutely do it, it'll just take me a while.  Please be patient if that's the case.

So why am I doing this here, to you cats?  Because the internet is my home these days - this is where I live.  I moved to Canada for my day job but I work here, i have friends here, I can be myself here.  And for whatever reason, people like you like what i do and that's what keeps me going in life.  Some people find their purpose in helping others, in raising a family, in caring for the sick, or animals, or inventing and creating.  What I do is write.  i make jokes, I make observations.  I share ideas, and puns and wordplay.  I do it because I want to make you laugh.  The world is grim sometimes and we all have down days; bad luck, depression or just the weight of the world hitting us square in the back.  So if I can lighten the load a little, put a smile on your face or make you laugh when things aren't their best, then I did my job.  I always say I'm not curing cancer, but I'm doing what I have a talent for, and that has a place too.

if you can help me, awesome.  if you can't , I just appreciate knowing you read this and know what I do.  I'll keep doing it as long as I can.

Thanks!  

FAQ! 


Q. How do I send you the info you need for my story? Will you contact me or do I need to do something?

A:You have two options here!  Either leave a comment with your name and preferred story details or wait for me to shoot an email your way.  The email option will take more time.

Q: What am I allowed to do with my stories? Can I share them with friends on facebook? Can I laminate it and put it in my wallet?

A:Once the story is yours, it's 100% yours to do with as you please.  Share it, post it, whatever.  

Q: Was the orgy you attended a Canadian orgy, or?

A:  Or!

Q: What kind of Doodles do you doodle?

A: This kind!

Q: What's in the Memento perk?

A: All memento packs will be different. but they will contain 2 items of my choosing and a story centered around them. This will give you an idea of maybe some of the kinds of things that could show up!

Q: What's the difference between a Felix Clay Surprise Pack and a Memento Perk?

A:  The Surprise Pack is bigger and more intense.  From a comedic standpoint, it's the difference between a pie in the face and like 20 pies in 20 faces.  it's 20 pies better is what it is.

I got perks, y'all!As you'll see, I'm trying to do what I do best (or at least moderately well) on your behalf.  Help me and I'll create for you.  As for when, it'll be as soon as possible.  But if 25,000 people donate $1 each, it may be a while for me to write 25,000 100 word short stories.  But don't doubt that I will absolutely do it, it'll just take me a while.  Please be patient if that's the case.So why am I doing this here, to you cats?  Because the internet is my home these days - this is where I live.  I moved to Canada for my day job but I work here, i have friends here, I can be myself here.  And for whatever reason, people like you like what i do and that's what keeps me going in life.  Some people find their purpose in helping others, in raising a family, in caring for the sick, or animals, or inventing and creating.  What I do is write.  i make jokes, I make observations.  I share ideas, and puns and wordplay.  I do it because I want to make you laugh.  The world is grim sometimes and we all have down days; bad luck, depression or just the weight of the world hitting us square in the back.  So if I can lighten the load a little, put a smile on your face or make you laugh when things aren't their best, then I did my job.  I always say I'm not curing cancer, but I'm doing what I have a talent for, and that has a place too.if you can help me, awesome.  if you can't , I just appreciate knowing you read this and know what I do.  I'll keep doing it as long as I can.Thanks!  FAQ! Q. How do I send you the info you need for my story? Will you contact me or do I need to do something?A:You have two options here!  Either leave a comment with your name and preferred story details or wait for me to shoot an email your way.  The email option will take more time.Q: What am I allowed to do with my stories? Can I share them with friends on facebook? Can I laminate it and put it in my wallet?A:Once the story is yours, it's 100% yours to do with as you please.  Share it, post it, whatever.  Q: Was the orgy you attended a Canadian orgy, or?A:  Or!Q: What kind of Doodles do you doodle?A: This kind!Q: What's in the Memento perk?A: All memento packs will be different. but they will contain 2 items of my choosing and a story centered around them. This will give you an idea of maybe some of the kinds of things that could show up!Q: What's the difference between a Felix Clay Surprise Pack and a Memento Perk?A:  The Surprise Pack is bigger and more intense.  From a comedic standpoint, it's the difference between a pie in the face and like 20 pies in 20 faces.  it's 20 pies better is what it is.

Please remember: if you would like to receive perks for your contribution, make sure to click the pink "Get this Perk" button on the corresponding box at right.

NOTE: Copies of The White Mountain will ship in April, 2018. All other perks will ship in September, 2016.

The White Mountain

365 Days of Mischief and Adventure on Mount Washington

Mount Washington, home of the world’s worst weather, is more than just a “Rock Pile”—it’s the cultural and natural soul of climbers and tourists from around the world. Travel writer and journalist Dan Szczesny will spend a year participating in Mount Washington's many happenings, including:

  • The Mt. Washington Observatory: Dan will spend a week on the summit—"Home of the World's Worst Weather"—cooking for the Mt. Washington Observatory crew. Since he does not cook, we're uncertain who will survive.
  • Seek the Peak: This annual fundraiser brings hikers from around the world together to converge at the summit from every direction on the mountain. We'll meet as many of them as possible.
  • Adaptive Sports Sunrise Ascent: Dan will be a "mule" on an adaptive sports team whose goal will be to reach the summit with an adaptive athlete who needs assistance.
  • Alton Weagle Day: Dan will try to make it into the record books by being the first person to climb the mountain dressed like Walt Whitman and reading poetry all the way up!
  • Dan's first ascent with a toddler: Perhaps the most grueling summit attempt of them all, Dan will backpack with his toddler daughter to the top.

Other events and chapters will include: The Bike Hill Climb, the Road Race, Minis on Top, ATV Climb and Bicknell's Thrush Tour. Dan will also look at the mountain's history and the strange convergence of organizations (Cog Railroad, Auto Road, State Park, National Forest and AMC) that come together to create an odd and exciting partnership.

Dan will capture all of these characters, experiences, observations, histories, and discoveries in The White Mountain!


Who Are We?

Founded in 1991, we have published more than fifty titles, almost all of which have strong connections to New England. We are a traditional, independent publisher that specializes in producing beautiful, well designed books—the care we take during each stage of pre-press is meticulous. We use fantastic printers located in the United States and work closely with all of our authors long after their books have been published. On top of its very dear-to-heart subject, The White Mountain is perfect for us because we know it will be written entertainingly and expertly by two-time Hobblebush author, Dan Szczesny.

For more information about Hobblebush Books, please visit www.hobblebush.com.

Dan Szczesny, Author

Dan Szczesny is a long-time journalist and author living in New Hampshire. His books include The Adventures of Buffalo and Tough Cookie, a hiking memoir about a one year, 225-mile journey through some of New Hampshire’s least known wilderness with his ten-year-old foster daughter; The Nepal Chronicles, about a month long trek to Everest Base Camp and marriage in Kathmandu; Mosquito Rain: Alaskan Travel Essays; and Sing and Other Short Stories, which includes a variety of short fiction spanning Dan’s twenty-five year career as a writer and journalist.

Dan began his career in Buffalo, New York. Since then, he has written for a wide variety of regional and national publications, including the Main Line Times, Philadelphia Weekly, Christian Science Monitor, Princeton Packet, Pennsylvania Magazine, all4woman,com, Yahoo! Parenting and Huffington Post. 

He’s a member of the Appalachian Mountain Club’s 4,000-footer club and has written extensively about the outdoors and hiking. He has camped in the Grand Canyon, hiked England’s Coast to Coast Trail, and trekked to Everest Base Camp in Nepal. He's also traveled to India and Turkey with his ten-month-old daughter. For more, check out: www.danszczesny.com.


What's In It For You?

Lots! We have great perks for each donation amount. Here are some examples:

  • Signed copies of many books, including The White Mountain, The Nepal Chronicles and Sing by Dan Szczesny; Life at the Top by Eric Pinder; and Mount Washington: A Short Guide and History by Steve D. Smith and Mike Dickerman
  • Signed and mounted photography prints from Jim Salge Photography—choose from these photos.
  • Pint glasses from Tuckerman Brewing Company
  • Nature photography prints from The MooseMan
  • Tickets to ride Conway Scenic Railroad's Notch Train
  • Access to our private Facebook group where you can chat with Dan
  • Your name in the acknowledgments in the printed book
  • An invitation for you plus a guest to attend our private reading before the launch
  • 40% off coupons for use at www.hobblebush.com
  • Registration for an adventure of your choice in Juggernaut Fitness's Adventure Series
  • One-month memberships to True Peak CrossFit.
  • Private lunch with the author and publisher.
  • Private hike with the author
NOTE: Copies of The White Mountain will ship in April, 2018. All other perks will ship in September, 2016.

What Will This Money Be Used For?

Participation & Research

Your generous contributions are essential to helping us present Mount Washington as it truly is—not just a mountain to be climbed, but a cultural center of the United States. As many writers know, it's not cheap to drop everything and spend a year doing research for a non-fiction book. On top of that, Dan's research will include participating in multiple events throughout 2017—all of which take place hours north of his hometown (Manchester, NH). Most of the funds we raise from this campaign will support Dan's efforts and will allow him the time and money needed to put forth this important book.

Printing

As a traditional publisher, we cover all pre-press and printing expenses and pay royalties to our authors on all of our books. The White Mountain, however, is a very grand endeavor—Dan will be spending a year participating in events on Mount Washington, and we'd like to document his experiences with full-color photos throughout the book. We aren't asking you to cover all of our printing expenses—that's our responsibility!—but a small portion of the funds we raise from this campaign will go towards the added expense of printing with full color and bleeds throughout, which we believe a book of this cultural significance deserves.


Other Ways You Can Help

Anything you can do to spread the word is helpful beyond belief. Here are a few ideas to get you started:

  • "Like" us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/YearOnWashington) and invite your friends
  • Share this campaign page on any social media sites you use
  • Encourage your local library or bookstore to host an event with Dan once the book is published
  • Drop us a line at info@hobblebush.com if you have any information that would be helpful about Mount Washington or its many events

Thank you!

Story of My Book

Mastermind: How Successful People Manage Their Mental Health

My name is Ali Friedman, and I am the author of Mastermind. After recently struggling with anxiety, I've been increasingly exposed to the prevalence of mental illness, a lack of understanding of said illnesses, and a lack of adequate resources to address the issues. As a result of my personal challenges and realizing that I was not alone, I felt it was time to take matters into my own hands, by openly exploring why the stigma exists and what can be done to overcome it.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that while mental health can seem like a daunting topic, there are tangible measures you can take to promote your well-being. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for mental health in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help implement strategies to relieve some of your stress and strengthen your overall wellness.

In this book, you'll learn about both formal and informal strategies to help maximize your success:
  • The Best and the Brightest - How those at the top of their field overcome their struggles and manage their stress
  • Normalization - How taking advantage of formal resources and mental health mechanisms such as therapy can benefit everyone, not just those who have a diagnosed illness
  • No Discrimination - How Olympians, to college students, to budding entrepreneurs alike can harness the same skills and utilize similar tools to promote their well-being

My goal is that this book has value for everyone who picks it up, rather than just those with mental illnesses or some niche group. Everyone deals with stress, so my hope is that this book will give people from all walks of life insight into how you can better manage, or at least be more aware of, your mental health.

Mastermind is a non-fiction book that speaks to college students and adults of all ages who want to look at mental wellness and managing stress in a new light.

 

The Book - Mastermind

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the Introduction + Chapters 1-3. You will learn about the stigma surrounding mental health, why no one wants to talk about it, and how that negatively affects our own perceptions. I will also highlight how mental issues are as real and painful as physical ones, and address the current lack of adequate resources.

Part 2 contains Chapters 4-5. In this section, I will suggest that there is evidence that society is moving in the right direction, but that we still have a ways to go, in regard to addressing the importance of mental health. Then, I will present the stories of an Olympic runner, a hostage negotiator, and a young Juilliard dancer to convey the benefits of formal resources offered in established company settings.

Part 3 contains Chapters 6-8, which focus on the more informal ways to promote your success, in whatever path you choose. I will compare the stories of those in large versus smaller businesses, and share how others have found tremendous value in the power of humor, as just one example.
 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July, 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Ali Friedman is a Government and Psychology double major at Georgetown University, particularly interested in the intersection of the two fields in regard to policy and how it affects real people. Ali currently works as an Intern Analyst at Hilltop Public Solutions, a democratic political consulting and public advocacy firm, where she conducts research on various legislation and how it impacts different parties.

Ali is passionate about mental health and advocating for those who are not able to express their voices. She has extensive experience tutoring young kids, working on political campaigns, marketing a small business, working in the food and retail industries, and communicating with clients involved in family law cases.

Outside of the realm of mental health, Ali can often be found dramatically reenacting embarrassing stories and venting with friends while roaming around with a family size carton of goldfish in hand.

For more information, you can connect with Ali at amf275@georgetown.edu, or at ali_friedman1 on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #Mastermind and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for all your love and support!


Thanks again,
Ali Friedman
